font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MILK IS<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> WHITE</span>-<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> GORA</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN THEY DRINK<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> MILK</span>\nTHEY SAY WE ARE <span style=\"background-color: lime;\">DRINK</span>ING (<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"> PEE</span> ) <span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">KSHIR.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">SO YOU </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 200%;\"><b>BASTARD</b></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"> ROTHSCHILD\nHISTORIANS \u2013&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">SHOVE YOUR FUCKIN\u2019 THEORIES UP YOUR GAAND ( THEY USE THIS WORD TOO WHILE ABUSING )&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me end with a TRUE\njoke:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our neighbours shifted\nto a new home an they called us for HOUSE WARMING CEREMONY.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since I was at sea\nfor so long I do NOT know the newly sprouted roads. In the car my wife was\nstitting with me in front and my father/ mother on the rear seat.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We got lost !</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pretty soon my father put down his window and ask all \u201c Where is\nKHSIR VIKASANA SHAALA ?\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All the people would\nsort of nod their heads to indicate- &nbsp; \u201dFUCK KNOWS !\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After about 6 such\nincidents , I asked my dad\u2014what in the name of Charles Bronson is this KSHIR\nVIKASANA SHAALA ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; Wherever I go Lord Nrsimha is there. He is in the heart and is\noutside as well. I surrender to Lord Nrsimha, the origin of all things and the\nsupreme refuge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">tava kara-kamala-vare\nnakham adbhuta-\u015b\u1e5b\u0144ga\u1e3f<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">dalita-hira\u1e47yaka\u015bipu-tanu-bh\u1e5b\u0144gam<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ke\u015bava dh\u1e5bta-narahari-r\u016bpa\njaya jagad\u012b\u015ba hare.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">O Kesava! O Lord of the\nuniverse! O Lord Hari, who have assumed the form of half-man, half-lionl All\nglories to You! lust as one can easily crush a wasp between one's fingernails,\nso in the same way the body of the wasp like demon Hiranyakasipu has been ripped\napart by the wonderful pointed nails on Your beautiful lotus hands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TODAY 28TH AUG 2015 IS ONAM&nbsp;</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EaQzvF9_YcI/Vd_pCrsTAdI/AAAAAAAA8jE/Ty9hU8Rxotw/s1600/AA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EaQzvF9_YcI/Vd_pCrsTAdI/AAAAAAAA8jE/Ty9hU8Rxotw/s640/AA.jpg\" width=\"520\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Onam is the only\nfestival on this planet which knows NO religion, language , caste, creed, sex,\nage, political leanings, financial status, or any other barriers. It is a\nunique festival-- the No 1 festival of Kerala-- at harvest time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Onam day we welcome OUR\nBELOVED ancient King Mahabali, the flower carpet if for him to sit on-- every\nhouse has it. People pray that such ancient prosperity should come back-- yet\nthe whole thing is more about GRATITUDE than greed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the flower\ncarpet ( pookalam )&nbsp; in my home this\nyear!&nbsp; This creation of fresh\nflowers&nbsp; is done by the whole\nfamily,&nbsp; and it is a symbol of family\ndynamics.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we will feast on banana plant leaf, as per our rich culture. We\nwill wear traditional clothes.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Michael Swift\u2019s gay\nmanifesto spAke:-<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Women, you cry for\nfreedom. You say you are no longer satisfied with men; they make you unhappy.\nWe, connoisseurs of the masculine face, the masculine physique, shall take your\nmen from you then. We will amuse them; we will instruct them; we will embrace\nthem when they weep. Women, you say you wish to live with each other instead of\nwith men. Then go and be with each other. We shall give your men pleasures they\nhave never known because we are foremost men too, and only one man knows how to\ntruly please another man; only one man can understand the depth and feeling,\nthe mind and body of another man.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All laws banning\nhomosexual activity will be revoked. Instead, legislation shall be passed which\nengenders love between men.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All homosexuals must\nstand together as brothers; we must be united artistically, philosophically,\nsocially, politically and financially. We will eliminate heterosexual liaisons\nthrough usage of the devices of wit and ridicule, devices which we are skilled\nin employing.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We will unmask the\npowerful homosexuals who masquerade as heterosexuals. You will be shocked and\nfrightened when you find that your presidents and their sons, your\nindustrialists, your senators, your mayors, your generals, your athletes, your\nfilm stars, your television personalities, your civic leaders, your priests are\nnot the safe, familiar, bourgeois, heterosexual figures you assumed them to be.\nWe are everywhere; we have infiltrated your ranks. We are not middle-class weaklings. Highly intelligent, we are the\nnatural aristocrats of the human race, and steely-minded aristocrats never\nsettle for less. Those who oppose us will be exiled.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We shall raise vast\nprivate armies, as Mishima did, to defeat you. The family unit, which only dampens imagination\nand curbs free will, must be eliminated. Perfect boys will be conceived and\ngrown in the genetic laboratory. They will be bonded together in communal\nsetting, under the control and instruction of homosexual savants.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All churches who\ncondemn us will be closed. Our only gods are handsome young men. We adhere to a\ncult of beauty, moral and esthetic. All that is ugly and vulgar and banal will\nbe annihilated. Since we are alienated from middle-class heterosexual\nconventions, we are free to live our lives according to the dictates of the\npure imagination. For us too much is not enough.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The exquisite society\nto emerge will be governed by an elite comprised of gay poets. One of the major\nrequirements for a position of power in the new society of homoeroticism will\nbe indulgence in the Greek passion. Any man contaminated with heterosexual lust\nwill be automatically barred from a position of influence. All males who insist\non remaining stupidly heterosexual will be tried in homosexual courts of\njustice and will become invisible men.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We shall rewrite\nhistory, history filled and debased with your heterosexual lies and\ndistortions. We shall portray the homosexuality of the great leaders and\nthinkers who have shaped the world. We will demonstrate that homosexuality and\nintelligence and imagination are inextricably linked, and that homosexuality is\na requirement for true nobility, true beauty in a man.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We shall be victorious\nbecause we are fueled with the ferocious bitterness of the oppressed who have\nbeen forced to play seemingly bit parts in your dumb, heterosexual shows throughout\nthe ages. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">NOW WIKIPEDIA HAS\nACCEPTED IT ! <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE: Cannibalism[edit]<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Many written reports\nand testimonies collected by the Australian War Crimes Section of the Tokyo\ntribunal, and investigated by prosecutor William Webb (the future\nJudge-in-Chief), indicate that Japanese personnel in many parts of Asia and the\nPacific committed acts of cannibalism against Allied prisoners of war. In many\ncases this was inspired by ever-increasing Allied attacks on Japanese supply\nlines, and the death and illness of Japanese personnel as a result of hunger.\nAccording to historian Yuki Tanaka: \"cannibalism was often a systematic\nactivity conducted by whole squads and under the command of\nofficers\".[112] This frequently involved murder for the purpose of\nsecuring bodies. For example, an Indian POW, Havildar Changdi Ram, testified\nthat: \"[on November 12, 1944] the Kempeitai beheaded [an Allied] pilot. I\nsaw this from behind a tree and watched some of the Japanese cut flesh from his\narms, legs, hips, buttocks and carry it off to their quarters ... They cut it\n[into] small pieces and fried it.\"[113]<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">In some cases, flesh\nwas cut from living people: another Indian POW, Lance Naik Hatam Ali (later a\ncitizen of Pakistan), testified in New Guinea and stated:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"... the Japanese\nstarted selecting prisoners and every day one prisoner was taken out and killed\nand eaten by the soldiers. I personally saw this happen and about 100 prisoners\nwere eaten at this place by the Japanese. The remainder of us were taken to\nanother spot 50 miles [80 km] away where 10 prisoners died of sickness. At this\nplace, the Japanese again started selecting prisoners to eat. Those selected\nwere taken to a hut where their flesh was cut from their bodies while they were\nalive and they were thrown into a ditch where they later died.\"[114]- UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; This is a\nnumerical representation of 67%. Of the eleven(11) eBay directors, two(2) are\nJews. This is a numerical representation of 18%. Jews are approximately 2% of\nthe U.S. population.* Therefore Jews are over-represented among the eBay\nexecutives by a factor of 33.5 times(3,350 percent) and over-represented among\nthe eBay directors by a factor of 9 times(900 percent).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWho Controls Apple?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSummary:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOf the ten(10) Apple executives, three(3) are Jews. This is\na numerical representation of 30%. Of the eight(8) Apple directors, five(5) are\nJews or have Jewish spouses. This is a numerical representation of 63%. Jews\nare approximately 2% of the U.S. population.* Therefore Jews and spouses of\nJews are over-represented among the Apple executives by a factor of 15\ntimes(1,500 percent) and over-represented among the Apple directors by a factor\nof 31.5 times(3,150 percent).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWho Controls Yahoo?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSummary:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOf the thirteen(13) Yahoo! executives, eight(8) are Jews or\nhave Jewish spouses. This is a numerical representation of 62%. Of the\neleven(11) Yahoo! directors, five(5) are Jews. This is a numerical\nrepresentation of 45%. Jews are approximately 2% of the U.S. population.*\nTherefore Jews and spouses of Jews are over-represented among the Yahoo!\nexecutives by a factor of 31 times(3,100 percent) and over-represented among\nthe Yahoo! directors by a factor of 22.5 times(2,250 percent).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWho Controls Google?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSummary:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOf the six(6) Google executives, four(4) are Jews or have\nJewish spouses. This is a numerical representation of 67%. Of the ten(10)\nGoogle directors, four(4) are Jews or have Jewish spouses. This is a numerical\nrepresentation of 40%. Jews are approximately 2% of the U.S. population.*\nTherefore Jews and spouses of Jews are over-represented among the Google\nexecutives by a factor of 33.5 times(3,350 percent) and over-represented among\nthe Google directors by a factor of 20 times(2,000 percent).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWho Controls Amazon?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSummary:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOf the eleven(11) Amazon.com executives, eight(8) are Jews.\nThis is a numerical representation of 73%. Of the nine(9) Amazon.com directors,\nsix(6) are Jews or have Jewish spouses. This is a numerical representation of\n67%. Jews are approximately 2% of the U.S. population.* Therefore Jews and\nspouses of Jews are over-represented among the Amazon.com executives by a\nfactor of 36.5 times(3,650 percent) and over-represented among the Amazon.com\ndirectors by a factor of 33.5 times(3,350 percent).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWho Controls Facebook?<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSummary:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOf the three(3) Facebook executives, three(3) are Jews. This is a numerical representation of 65%. Ajit VadakayilMarch 21, 2015 at 10:33 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSummary:<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOf the fifty-one(51) senior executives of the major Wall\nStreet banks, trade exchanges, and regulatory agencies, thirty-seven(37) are\nJews or have Jewish spouses. When\ngays pet they inhale each other's testosterone, oxytocin, and vasopressin.\nLesbians experience more oxytocin while gays experience less oxytocin and more\nvasopressin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SQ00DUOgQBs/VdqlR0JehvI/AAAAAAAA8RE/qbr3GKdhq9E/s1600/carol-mike-werneRr-oxytocin-molecule.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SQ00DUOgQBs/VdqlR0JehvI/AAAAAAAA8RE/qbr3GKdhq9E/s640/carol-mike-werneRr-oxytocin-molecule.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxytocin receptors are\nexpressed by neurons in the amygdala. Nasally administered oxytocin can reduce\nfear, possibly by inhibiting the amygdala . Oxytocin has a half-life of around\nthree minutes in the blood.&nbsp; Oxytocin given\nintravenously does not enter the brain in significant quantities - it is\nexcluded from the brain by the blood-brain barrier.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxytocin is released\ninto the blood during labour - triggering the production of breast milk - and\nfloods the brain during breastfeeding, helping mother and baby bond.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The team found that compared with dogs given only a saline nasal spray,\nthe oxytocin-dosed dogs showed more positive social behavior toward other dogs\nand humans. It\ncentred on allegations that highly placed members of the Liberal government,\nunder H. H. Asquith as Prime Minister, had profited by improper use of\ninformation about the Government's intentions with respect to the Marconi\nCompany: knowing that the government was about to issue a lucrative contract to\nthe British Marconi company for the Imperial Wireless Chain, they had bought\nshares in an American subsidiary.[1]. Allegations and rumours centred on\ninsider trading in Marconi's shares and involved a number of government ministers,\nincluding Lloyd George, the Chancellor of the Exchequer; Sir Rufus Isaacs, the\nAttorney General; Herbert Samuel, Postmaster General; and the Treasurer of the\nLiberal Party, the Master of Elibank, Lord Murray. The allegations included the\nfact that Isaacs' brother, Godfrey Isaacs, was managing director of the Marconi\ncompany: </span></i>UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are an estimated\n40 million Pashtuns around the world including more than 14 million in\nAfghanistan and 28 million in Pakistan, mainly in the North West Frontier\nProvince and Tribal areas but also with a strong presence in Karachi ( Khans /\nAfridis etc ). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; UNQUOTE --&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The business in Bombay\nwas carried on by the brother of Elias Sassoon , &nbsp;Solomon who was a banking partner of R . &nbsp;He also ran &nbsp;R\u2019s Oriental Life Insurance Company. &nbsp;He was a trustee of the Bombay Port Trust and\na director of the Bank of Bombay.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Edward Sassoon\n(Albert Abdulla\u2019s son, born in Bombay) married Baron Gustave de Rothschild\u2019s\ndaughter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Edward was\nsucceeded by his son Sir Philip who inherited his seat in Parliament. The\nfinancial wizard of the family, &nbsp;Sir\nVictor Sassoon further extended the empire of the Sassoons.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sassoon family\u2019s Indian\nfronts were media barons \u2013 Dalmia Jain through the Times of India, Birlas\nthrough the Hindustan Times, Leader, Searchlight and Bharat &nbsp;-- among many other agents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; He was ZE sheriff of Kolkata. He was knighted with the\nKCIE.&nbsp; He was again honoured with the\ndignity of a Knight Commander of the Royal Victorian Order (KCVO) <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Ashutosh Mukherjee,\nwas the second Indian Vice-Chancellor of the University of Calcutta for four\nconsecutive two-year terms (1906\u20131914) and a fifth two-year term (1921\u201323). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He outsourced his math\nto his first wife Serbian Mathematician Mileva Maric (older than him by 4 years\n) , Marcel Grossmann,&nbsp; Satyendranath Bose\nand the students of Calcutta University\u2014 the Indian vice chancellor Mookerjee would\nbe knighted by R in gratitude.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Independence 65\nParsis were knighted by Rothschild. &nbsp;Today their descendants are all hiding in shame.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The founder of the Calcutta\nJewish community</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shalom Aharon Obadiah Cohen,&nbsp; &nbsp;arrived in Calcutta on August 4, 1798 from\nAleppo, Syria and started off in the Opium business along with silks.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KkIcnR9xZAo/VeCQmHqxoRI/AAAAAAAA8k0/UG8zrJU-d3s/s1600/Jedwish%2BCemetery%2BDad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was a court jeweler\nto the Nawab of Awadh and also traveled to Punjab to the Court of Maharaj\nRanjit Singh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jew historians\nclaim that Cohen Paaji&nbsp; was asked to\nvalue the Kohinoor diamond. On seeing the precious jewel he told the King that\nthe diamond had no value. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When asked\nto explain himself he said that the diamond had no value because it would\neither be given as a gift or taken with bloodshed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is how R came to know about this diamond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Allahabad High Court\ngave sanction to the live-in relationship between one Payal Sharma and a\nmarried man. In a habeas corpus petition decided by Justice M. Katju, the court\nstated that Ms. Sharma being 21 years of age, and therefore a major, had the\nright to go anywhere and live with anyone, as she chose. In elaborating on the\ndecision, the court stated, ? In our opinion, a man and a woman, even without\ngetting married, can live together if they so wish. This may be regarded as\nimmoral by society, but is not illegal. There is a difference between law and\nmorality<i>.? Out of these\nnine systems eight of them are atheistic as there is no place for God in them.:\nUNQUOTE \u2013Markendey Katju <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THE BOOKS IS STILL IN MY HOME LIBRARY..<br />\n<br />\nHIS QUATRAINS ARE VAGUE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE HITLERs NAME WAS CONVERTED TO HISTER TO ACCOMODATE THE PREDICTIONS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL -- HIS ORIGINAL NAME WAS NOT HILTER ( BUT HEIDLER AS PER SCHOOL RECORDS )-- IT WAS GRANTED TO HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A PERFECT CASE OF CREATING TRUTHS VIA THE BACK DOOR..<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW1 AND WW2 --ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe book of predictions is Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting future events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW NOSTRADAMUS WAS MADE POPULAR BY HIS ALMANAC WHICH WAS LIFTED FROM KERALA ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil declares today at 1105 AM, on 4th Jan 2018-- SATYA VACHAN that Nostradamus's predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH QUATRAINS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN VEDAS HAS SUCH COOKED UP VERSES INJECTED --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS WORKED VIA BACKDOOR BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs FREEMASONS --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..<br />\n<br />\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<br />\n<br />\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn the city of York there will be a great collapse,<br />\n2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos<br />\nWhile the fortress falls; the great leader will succumb;<br />\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,<br />\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues<br />\nIn the new city,<br />\nAnd the world will end soon after.<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 52.95%..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; I WORKED IN AN EXTREME STRESSFUL FIELD EXPOSED DAY AFTER DAY TO DEADLY CHEMICALS , &nbsp;GETTING TO EAT ONLY FROZEN AND PROCESSED FOODS , WITH POOR INTERRUPTED &nbsp;SLEEP CYCLES &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BUT I HAVE NIL BODY BUILDING SUPPLEMENTS INSIDE ME ..&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THERE LIES THE DIFFERENCE &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>90% of people who take\nbody building supplements suffer from BDD.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/body-dysmorphic-disorder-bdd-increasing.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/body-dysmorphic-disorder-bdd-increasing.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Body dysmorphic\ndisorder is also referred to as reverse anorexia. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with anorexia\nsees specific body parts as being too big, - on the contrary a person with BDD\nsees their body parts as being too small or too undeveloped. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Supplements are used by\nbody builders with BDD in the same way that diet pills are used by people with\neating disorders. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both cases, the gullible\nperson is being influenced by BENAMI media, Zionist culture, and what\u2019s\nconsidered to be socially accepted standards of body type.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors refer to muscle\ndysmorphia as bigorexia or reverse anorexia. &nbsp;The term, muscle dysmorphia, refers to a\nsubtype of body dysmorphic disorder (BDD), which is a type of obsessive\ncompulsive disorder (OCD ) . &nbsp;Due to the\ninfluence of EVIL PHARMA and the main stream media ,men have become\nincreasingly dissatisfied with their perceived body images.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lots of these guys are\nencouraged by coaches and trainers to take these supplements \u2014 who get a\ncommission ( kickback ) from the manufacturers lobby .&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men taking body\nbuilding supplements are convinced that these things are healthy, without side\neffects.&nbsp; There are thousands of Youtube\nvideos on the net with musclemen ( with muscle between their ears ) &nbsp;praising these supplements .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men with bigorexia\nspend excessive amounts of time working out in the gym, dieting, checking themselves\nin a mirror, comparing themselves to others, and seeking reassurance from\nothers about their appearance. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Many of\nthem also abuse anabolic steroids in an effort to build muscle mass and foster\nmore lean muscle tissue.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a must to\nrecognize the signs of bigorexia and differentiate them from behaviors of those\nwho simply exercise and work out everyday to stay fit and healthy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These people are\nmentally SICK and it is important to seek professional help.&nbsp; Left untreated, this disorder can significantly\nreduce quality of life and result in severe depression.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">People with this\ncondition may exhibit the following signs:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Constantly worry about\nmuscle size<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Spend excessive amounts\nof time working out that interferes with social life or performance at school\nand work<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Constantly scrutinizing\nmuscles in the mirror<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Weighing several times\na day<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Take great care to\navoid looking at self in mirror<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Wear baggy clothing in\npublic to keep others from seeing his body \u2014POT BELLY, GARGANTUAN ASS, PERCEIVED\nMAN BOOBS .</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind you, the Zionist\nhijacked International Olympic Committee classifies creatine as a banned\nsubstance.&nbsp; The body may stop producing\nits own creatine as a way to regain homeostasis when high amounts of\nsupplemental creatine are taken regularly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Excessive amounts of\nthese natural ingredients or active ingredients that the body finds difficult\nto metabolise can place a major burden on the organs such as the liver and\nkidneys. When you liver and kidneys are out of WHACK you look old at a young\nage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver is the\n\u2018brain\u2019 organ of the body which helps to detoxify blood, stores vitamins and\niron, stores glycogen, breaks down insulin and regulates the fat burning\nhormones.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">The kidneys help with waste excretion, water level balance, blood\npressure and acid balance within the blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine is already\npresent in our muscle tissue and one it of its roles is to absorb water from\nthe blood and then to shunt into our muscle tissue. This may cause muscle\ncramps and dehydration because shifting the body water away from the major\norgans into the skeletal muscle is a serious issue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Side effects of\ncreatine include dizziness, high blood pressure, liver dysfunction and kidney\ndamage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aspartame when broken\ndown produces formaldehyde which causes damage to the nerves, liver and\nkidneys.&nbsp; Many of the sweeteners within\nprotein supplements are artificial and this makes them more difficult for the\nbody to break down.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aspartame they use in\nsugar free zero calorie artificial sugar is bad for heath . &nbsp;Aspartame is comprised of methanol,\nphenylalanine and aspartic acid.&nbsp; When\naspartame breaks down it produces DKP. As your stomach digests DKP, it produces\na chemical which causes&nbsp; brain\ntumors.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotional and mood\ndisorders have been linked to aspartame.&nbsp;\nAspartame increases your hunger and&nbsp;\nimpedes your weight loss.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nPhenylalanine and aspartic acid can cause spikes in insulin levels and force\nyour body to remove the glucose from your blood stream and store it as\nfat.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aspartame inhibits the\nproduction of serotonin and prevents your brain from signalling to your body\nthat you are full.&nbsp; This leads to food\ncravings and make it more difficult for you to lose weight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High levels of protein\nsupplementation can produce a huge amount of acids within the body this is\ncaused by the introduction of sulphates and phosphates. The kidneys counteract\nthis increase in blood acid levels by secreting acid.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AN ACIDIC BODY CAUSES\nCANCER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the same time the\nbones release calcium which is unfortunately lost in your urine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the long term this\ncan lead to weakening of the bones and osteoporosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High intake of protein\ncan place a stress on the kidneys due to the increased levels of ketones. Ketones are a waste product of protein\nmetabolism and if a weakness is already present in the kidneys- a high protein\nintake can further exacerbate any renal issues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are consuming a\nhigh protein diet and not enough adequate carbs (this is a very common scenario\nfor bodybuilders) then your body will be in a state of \u2018ketosis\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketosis is a metabolic\nprocess that occurs when the body does not have enough glucose for energy.\nStored fats are broken down, resulting in a build-up of acids called ketones\nwithin the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This build- up of\ntoxins sends the kidneys into overdrive and in this process more water is\npassed out as urine. This mechanism can increase the incidence of dehydration\nand it is further heightened when exercising due to sweat loss. Dehydration can\nlead to dizziness, sluggishness and in extreme cases heart function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some coaches encourage\nketosis by following a diet called the ketogenic or low-carb diet. The aim of\nthe diet is to try and burn off unwanted fat by forcing the body to rely on\nburning fat for energy, rather than carbohydrates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketosis is also\ncommonly observed in patients with diabetes, as the process can occur if the\nbody does not have enough insulin. In normal circumstances, the body gets its\nenergy from glucose. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Typically, glucose\ncomes from carbohydrates - sugar and starchy foods such as bread and pasta -\nwhich the body is able to break down. Glucose can either be used to fuel the\nbody or stored in the liver and muscles as a chemical called glycogen.1<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there is not enough\nglucose present, the body will resort to an alternative strategy in order to\nfuel itself. &nbsp;&nbsp;Excess fat will begin to\nbe broken down in order to provide a source of glucose. A by-product of this\nprocess are ketones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketones are acids that\nbuild-up in the blood and can appear in urine.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;In small amounts, they serve to\nindicate that the body is breaking down fat, but high levels of ketones can\npoison the body, leading to ketoacidosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketosis like I\nsaid,&nbsp; is a metabolic process whereby the\nbody converts fat into products that can be used to burn for energy, in turn\nmaking ketones. &nbsp;&nbsp;Ketoacidosis is thus a condition whereby the\nlevels of ketones in the body are at an abnormally high level, poisoning the\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When in this state,\nlipid energy metabolism is intact. This means the body will begin to break down\nstored body fat to use as fuel, rather than source it from carbohydrates which\nyou have ingested<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out how my\nfriends gangantuan ass became two tiny hamburger buns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/12/type-2-diabetes-evolving-epidemic-in.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/12/type-2-diabetes-evolving-epidemic-in.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High-protein,\nlow-carbohydrate diets, are being widely promoted as effective weight loss\nplans.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These programs\ngenerally recommend that dieters get 30% to 50% of their total calories from\nprotein.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A good doctor who knows\nhis job will recommend that you pursue a diet plan in which a smaller\npercentage of calories come from protein.&nbsp;\nNormally your body burns carbohydrates NOT fat&nbsp; This turns into creatine phosphate in the body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine phosphate\ncontributes to making a substance called adenosine triphosphate (ATP). This\nhelps in strengthening our muscles by providing the energy for muscle\ncontractions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ATP is the high-energy\nmolecule that stores the energy we need to do just about everything we do.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is present in the cytoplasm and\nnucleoplasm of every cell, and essentially all the physiological mechanisms\nthat require energy for operation obtain it directly from the stored ATP.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As food in the cells is\ngradually oxidized, the released energy is used to re-form the ATP so that the\ncell always maintains a supply of this essential molecule. When&nbsp; the body needs energy, ATP is converted into\nADP(adenosine diphosphate) and ATP is replenished by phosphocreatine while the\nbody rests.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbohydrates, fats, and\nproteins can all be used by cells to synthesize large quantities of adenosine\ntriphosphate (ATP), which can be used as an energy source for almost all other\ncellular functions. For this reason, ATP has been called an energy \u201ccurrency\u201d\nin cell metabolism.&nbsp; .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, ATP energy is used for the\nsynthesis of cholesterol, phospholipids, the hormones, and almost all other\nsubstances of the body. Even the urea excreted by the kidneys requires ATP for\nits formation from ammonia.&nbsp; ATP\nEnergizes Glandular Secretion and&nbsp;\nenergizes nerve conduction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Skeletal muscles can\nperform extreme feats of strength for a few seconds but are much less capable\nduring prolonged activity. Most of the extra energy required during these\nbursts of activity cannot come from the oxidative processes because they are\ntoo slow to respond. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead, the extra\nenergy comes from anaerobic sources: (1) ATP already present in the muscle\ncells, (2) phosphocreatine in the cells, and (3) anaerobic energy released by\nglycolytic breakdown of glycogen to lactic acid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Listen, I can get more\ntechnical\u2014it will go over my readers heads.&nbsp; &nbsp;Hence the attempt to keep it for the LCD ( lowest common denominator )\n.&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the ATP pool gets\nfull, excess creatine monohydrate turns to waste in the body.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;As\ncreatine draws water from other areas of the body and into muscle tissue,\ndrinking lots of fluids while taking this supplement is a must.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine monohydrate\ndoses should be spread out over the day\u2014and NEVER EVER&nbsp; take creatine monohydrate if you are under 18\nor if you have any kidney problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid is a compound\nproduced by your body that contains carbon, nitrogen, oxygen and hydrogen. It\nforms salts called urates. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7OOXKHvxu-Q/Vc7nucGyoKI/AAAAAAAA71c/4-p7f-beSXU/s1600/creati9ne2.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"165\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7OOXKHvxu-Q/Vc7nucGyoKI/AAAAAAAA71c/4-p7f-beSXU/s320/creati9ne2.gif\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Uric acid is created\nwhen your body breaks down purine nucleotides, a crystallized substance that is\nconsidered a building block of DNA. &nbsp;High\namounts of uric acid in your blood stream can lead to kidney damage and kidney\nstones.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine increases&nbsp; production of uric acid in your body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rather Uric acid is a\nbyproduct of creatine metabolism in your body, which directly increases uric\nacid levels in your bloodstream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/uric-acid-oxidation-of-purines-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/uric-acid-oxidation-of-purines-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine &nbsp;causes &nbsp;kidney damage because its by-product,\nCreatinine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2hv42havE4w/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2hv42havE4w?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
