text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YSf7Q50of5k/Vc7Ur3ZBKrI/AAAAAAAA70I/2EBfr_caawg/s1600/beetroot-heDalth-benefits1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"215\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YSf7Q50of5k/Vc7Ur3ZBKrI/AAAAAAAA70I/2EBfr_caawg/s400/beetroot-heDalth-benefits1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine, ( &nbsp;creatine citrate ), is a compound created by\ncomponents of proteins, called amino acids, in the human body. &nbsp;&nbsp;Created in a person\u2019s liver and other vital\norgans, it helps supply the muscles with energy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatinine, on the\nother hand, is the waste created from the body\u2019s use of creatine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Essentially, the main\ndifference between creatine and creatinine is the fact that the former is\nnecessary for the body while the latter does not perform a vital function. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatinine is important,\nhowever, in revealing possible kidney problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both of these\nsubstances are made within the human body, but only one is produced to benefit\nthe body. &nbsp;The liver, pancreas, and\nkidneys produce creatine and send it to the muscles through a person\u2019s blood.\nIt helps the muscles perform well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In comparison, the body\ndoes not need creatinine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though it is a\nbyproduct, creatinine can prove helpful in health evaluations. Doctors perform\nblood and urine tests to check creatinine levels and determine whether a\nperson\u2019s kidney function is adequate. The kidneys process creatinine out of the\nbody in the form of urine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the kidneys are not\nfunctioning as they should, however, creatinine levels can rise. When tests\nreveal that levels of this substance are high, a doctor usually performs\nadditional testing to determine the extent of the problems with a person\u2019s\nkidneys. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One reason high levels\nof creatinine are so worrisome is the fact that the body doesn\u2019t usually\nproduce much of it. &nbsp;In fact, only about\ntwo percent of the body\u2019s creatine ends up as creatinine on a given day. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the body stores\nmost of its creatine in its muscles, it can take a long time for this substance\nto be used and lead to creatine production.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine helps with\nweight-lifting performance and athletic pursuits that require strength but only\nlast for a short time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Creatinine is a waste\nproduct of creatine, and loading creatine will increase your creatinine levels.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But check out what the\nEVIL Creatine manufacturers tell you---to be frank they are the quintessential monkeys\nwith the matchstick.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; At low doses, around 1-3 grams, creatine is\nabsorbed well.&nbsp; As the dose gets higher,\nthe absorption decreases, which is why you can't overdose on creatine\u2014at least,\nnot in a way that would present a medical concern.:&nbsp; UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZR8bGPjA5GA/Vc7Y76a398I/AAAAAAAA70U/b0tNNMwN46g/s1600/doFG3wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZR8bGPjA5GA/Vc7Y76a398I/AAAAAAAA70U/b0tNNMwN46g/s400/doFG3wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proteinuria is also\ncalled albuminuria or urine albumin-- &nbsp;a\ncondition in which urine contains an abnormal amount of protein. &nbsp;&nbsp;Albumin is the main protein in the blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proteins are the\nbuilding blocks for all body parts, including muscles, bones, hair, and nails.\nProteins in the blood also perform a number of important functions. They\nprotect the body from infection, help blood clot, and keep the right amount of\nfluid circulating throughout the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As blood passes through\nhealthy kidneys, they filter out the waste products and leave in the things the\nbody needs, like albumin and other proteins. &nbsp;Most proteins are too big to pass through the\nkidneys' filters into the urine. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, proteins from\nthe blood can leak into the urine when the filters of the kidney, called\nglomeruli, are damaged.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z3gEzdJnaM0/Vc7ZerfXy9I/AAAAAAAA70c/fKLCjc9Sub8/s1600/5-1302f210ZZ3K8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"288\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z3gEzdJnaM0/Vc7ZerfXy9I/AAAAAAAA70c/fKLCjc9Sub8/s400/5-1302f210ZZ3K8.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/J2YaULhMx5g/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/J2YaULhMx5g?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proteinuria is a sign\nof chronic kidney disease (CKD), which can result from diabetes, high blood\npressure, and diseases that cause inflammation in the kidneys. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Testing for albumin in\nthe urine is part of a routine medical assessment for everyone . Kidney disease\nis sometimes called renal disease. &nbsp;If\nCKD progresses, it can lead to end-stage renal disease (ESRD), when the kidneys\nfail completely. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person with ESRD must\nreceive a kidney transplant or regular blood-cleansing treatments called\ndialysis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/IQKQ4eoKfTg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/IQKQ4eoKfTg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both type 1 and type\n2 diabetes, albumin in the urine is one of the first signs of deteriorating\nkidney function. &nbsp;&nbsp;As kidney function\ndeclines, the amount of albumin in the urine increases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proteinuria &nbsp;means protein in your urine. Your kidneys make\nurine by cleaning extra fluid from your blood.&nbsp;\nYour kidneys also help prevent the loss of things that your body needs,\nlike protein.&nbsp; Proteinuria happens when\nyour kidneys let protein leak into your urine.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protein in your urine\nmay also be called albuminuria or microalbuminuria. If proteinuria is not\ncontrolled, the increased amount of protein in your urine can lead to more\nkidney damage.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL BODY BUILDERS WHO\nTAKE KIDNEY DAMAGING SUPPLEMENTS &nbsp;\u2013 WHEN YOU\nPEE INTO THE SHIT POT IN THE MORNING , KEEP YOUR EYES OPEN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\nONCE YOUR KIDNEY IS OUT OF WHACK -WHAT IS THE POINT IN SAVING MONEY ?<br />\n<br />\nHEALTH IS WEALTH!<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-P4uScXOefy4/Vc7mv2QCvAI/AAAAAAAA70s/7rfzc8FnSpI/s1600/1-amino-06acid-metabolism-32-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-P4uScXOefy4/Vc7mv2QCvAI/AAAAAAAA70s/7rfzc8FnSpI/s640/1-amino-06acid-metabolism-32-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your kidneys &nbsp;fail, and will need dialysis or a kidney\ntransplant. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people do not\nnotice any symptoms.&nbsp; If you do have\nsymptoms, they might include foamy urine or swelling in your feet or puffed face.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4J9FkV8wKxI/Vc7m4tNlBOI/AAAAAAAA700/jcaylVBm1W0/s1600/1-amino-acid-mgetabolism-33-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4J9FkV8wKxI/Vc7m4tNlBOI/AAAAAAAA700/jcaylVBm1W0/s640/1-amino-acid-mgetabolism-33-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large amounts of\nprotein in the urine causes it to look foamy in the toilet. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because &nbsp;protein has left the body, the blood can no\nlonger soak up enough fluid, so swelling in the hands, feet, abdomen, or face\nmay occur. &nbsp;This swelling is called\nedema.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount of albumin\nin the urine sample is compared with the amount of creatinine, a waste product\nof normal muscle breakdown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7ZY7M7xs0UA/Vc7oXUZ3CkI/AAAAAAAA718/AICZmUtkmLQ/s1600/downlgg456oad.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7ZY7M7xs0UA/Vc7oXUZ3CkI/AAAAAAAA718/AICZmUtkmLQ/s400/downlgg456oad.png\" width=\"332\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The measurement is\ncalled a urine albumin-to-creatinine ratio (UACR). &nbsp;A urine sample containing more than 30\nmilligrams of albumin for each gram of creatinine (30 mg/g) is a warning that\nthere may be a problem. If the laboratory test exceeds 30 mg/g, another UACR\ntest should be done 1 to 2 weeks later. If the second test also shows high\nlevels of protein, the person has persistent proteinuria-- sign of declining\nkidney function.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yXRNFalfoFU/Vc7nKE5p9TI/AAAAAAAA71E/qK1Mk93lkBA/s1600/5-130d21PU620243.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"476\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yXRNFalfoFU/Vc7nKE5p9TI/AAAAAAAA71E/qK1Mk93lkBA/s640/5-130d21PU620243.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having too much\ncreatinine in the blood is a sign that a person has kidney damage. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The doctor can use the\ncreatinine measurement to estimate how efficiently the kidneys are filtering\nthe blood. This calculation is called the estimated glomerular filtration rate,\nor eGFR. CKD is present when the eGFR is less than 60 milliliters per minute\n(mL/min).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZFJJCyHI1QM/Vc7njxSt4PI/AAAAAAAA71M/XVWgocdj04Y/s1600/biochemistry-ii-protein-3metabolism-of-amino-acids-46-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZFJJCyHI1QM/Vc7njxSt4PI/AAAAAAAA71M/XVWgocdj04Y/s640/biochemistry-ii-protein-3metabolism-of-amino-acids-46-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatinine is generated\nfrom the breakdown of creatine phosphate during muscle metabolism, while urea\nis the product of protein metabolism. &nbsp;Creatine\nis a chemical made naturally by the body and is used to supply energy mainly to\nmuscles.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatine is an\namino-acid-like substance synthesized in the liver from the amino acids\nglycine, methionine, and arginine. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthetic creatine\naffects the activity of the insulin hormone..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l9WZcIHC4XM/Vc7nn3Er2FI/AAAAAAAA71U/3QlWsXlk5AY/s1600/C2Pt4dF3v2.PNG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l9WZcIHC4XM/Vc7nn3Er2FI/AAAAAAAA71U/3QlWsXlk5AY/s640/C2Pt4dF3v2.PNG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microalbuminuria is a\nsensitive test that can detect a small amount of protein in the urine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When abnormal proteins\npass through the glomeruli, patients can find noticeable bubbles in their urine.\nProtein excreted from body with urine, increases the surface tension of urine\nand makes them bubbles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zJmvnkSlQeI/Vc7n3oHoW6I/AAAAAAAA71k/n8LHOJLH7sw/s1600/creatine%2Bupvftake.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"338\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zJmvnkSlQeI/Vc7n3oHoW6I/AAAAAAAA71k/n8LHOJLH7sw/s400/creatine%2Bupvftake.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have a large\namount of high protein food at a time, it can lead to temporary proteinuria.\nThis is a normal case so you do not need to worry about it. If you change your\ndiet, the foam in urine will disappear.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mw9cjV6YnfE/Vc7odxSmWzI/AAAAAAAA72E/lnUqSkJKeNQ/s1600/imagee5s.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"168\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mw9cjV6YnfE/Vc7odxSmWzI/AAAAAAAA72E/lnUqSkJKeNQ/s640/imagee5s.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have intense\nexercises or keep the same gesture for a long time like standing too long, you\nmay find foam in urine. If you rest for a while, the foam will disappear.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cbGa5Fh7YvE/Vc7n9sFPcUI/AAAAAAAA71s/bf9fhBrCUpw/s1600/creatinine-and-crreatinine-clearance-4-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cbGa5Fh7YvE/Vc7n9sFPcUI/AAAAAAAA71s/bf9fhBrCUpw/s640/creatinine-and-crreatinine-clearance-4-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Presence of excess\nprotein in urine is not a sign of a healthy body.&nbsp; If it is excreted out of the body, it may\nindicate kidney dysfunction.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note:&nbsp; Foamy urine and diabetes are interrelated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Long term proteinuria\nwill in turn damage the glomerular basement membrane and further worsen renal\ndamages.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7SR4l6a-gEU/Vc7pmFt08eI/AAAAAAAA72k/ZaNXxVvBBCM/s1600/i5jnmmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7SR4l6a-gEU/Vc7pmFt08eI/AAAAAAAA72k/ZaNXxVvBBCM/s400/i5jnmmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, creatinine\nand urea enter blood stream, and then healthy kidneys are responsible for\neliminating these waste products from the body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, when kidney\ncan\u2019t do its work normally, creatinine and urea level in the blood increases\nspontaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bA8vU533bvQ/Vc7okAt0tKI/AAAAAAAA72M/H0F69vd8d9A/s1600/imagenks.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bA8vU533bvQ/Vc7okAt0tKI/AAAAAAAA72M/H0F69vd8d9A/s400/imagenks.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creatinine is removed\nfrom the body entirely by the kidneys. Creatinine is removed from the blood\nchiefly by the kidneys, primarily by glomerular filtration, but also by\nproximal tubular secretion.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Little or\nno tubular reabsorption of creatinine occurs. If the filtration in the kidney\nis deficient, creatinine blood levels rise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mgw6sfy1vvg/Vc7pxysS3_I/AAAAAAAA72s/COH1cXQXbpY/s1600/uri9lmnary-4-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Mgw6sfy1vvg/Vc7pxysS3_I/AAAAAAAA72s/COH1cXQXbpY/s640/uri9lmnary-4-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said, Creatinine\ncan also be measured by a blood test.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;If kidney function is not normal, creatinine\nlevel increases in your blood. &nbsp;This is\nbecause less creatinine is released through your urine. &nbsp;A normal result is 0.7 to 1.3 mg/dL for men\nand 0.6 to 1.1 mg/dL for women.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I0fGHJPFO4A/Vc7oq4MqexI/AAAAAAAA72U/TJg9KPxcDtA/s1600/imgbs30007.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"284\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I0fGHJPFO4A/Vc7oq4MqexI/AAAAAAAA72U/TJg9KPxcDtA/s640/imgbs30007.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, Creatinine is a\nchemical waste molecule that is generated from muscle metabolism. &nbsp;&nbsp;Each day, 1-2% of muscle creatine is\nconverted to creatinine. Because the muscle mass in the body is relatively\nconstant from day to day, the creatinine production normally remains\nessentially unchanged on a daily basis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abnormal results of\nurine creatinine may be due to any of the following:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High\nRED meat diet<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidney\nproblems, such as damage to the tubule cells<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidney\nfailure<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Too\nlittle blood flow to the kidneys, damage to filtering units<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidney\ninfection (pyelonephritis)<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women usually have a\nlower creatinine level than men. This is because women usually have less muscle\nmass than men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, creatinine\nlevels in blood and urine may be used to calculate the creatinine clearance\n(CrCl), which correlates with the glomerular filtration rate (GFR). Blood\ncreatinine levels may also be used alone to calculate the estimated GFR (eGFR).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LvJ6pVkigVk/Vc7o8JApjvI/AAAAAAAA72c/u5wU1QzcFOo/s1600/creatine%2Bupvftake.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"542\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LvJ6pVkigVk/Vc7o8JApjvI/AAAAAAAA72c/u5wU1QzcFOo/s640/creatine%2Bupvftake.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The GFR is clinically\nimportant because it is a measurement of renal function.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Creatinine\nlevel mainly depends on the GFR(Glomerular Filtration Rate).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors determine the\nseverity of chronic kidney disease with a staging system that uses GFR: ----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stage 1: GFR 90 or\ngreater (normal kidney function)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stage 2: GFR 60-90&nbsp; (mild decline in kidney function)</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stage 3: GFR 30-59\n(moderate decline in kidney function)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stage 4: GFR 15-29\n(severe decline in kidney function)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stage 5: GFR less than\n15 (kidney failure, usually requiring dialysis) </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People over age 60 may\nhave an apparently normal creatinine blood level, but still have a low GFR and\ncreatinine clearance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people do not need\ndialysis until GFR and creatinine clearance fall very low<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An alternate estimation\nof renal function can be made when interpreting the blood (plasma)\nconcentration of creatinine along with that of urea.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood urea nitrogen\n(BUN) level is another indicator of kidney function. Urea is also a metabolic\nbyproduct which can build up if kidney function is impaired. The BUN-to-creatinine\nratio generally provides more precise information about kidney function and its\npossible underlying cause compared with creatinine level alone. BUN also\nincreases with dehydration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUN-to-creatinine ratio\n(the ratio of blood urea nitrogen to creatinine) can indicate other problems\nbesides those intrinsic to the kidney.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If both BUN and\ncreatinine are high, the ratio usually indicates damage to the kidneys..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If BUN is high but\ncreatinine is normal, then the kidney is generally not damaged but is not\ngetting adequate blood supply due to another problem such as dehydration or\nheart failure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The kidneys maintain\nthe blood creatinine in a normal range. Creatinine has been found to be a\nfairly reliable indicator of kidney function. Elevated creatinine level\nsignifies impaired kidney function or kidney disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain drugs can\nsometimes cause abnormally elevated creatinine levels. Serum creatinine can\nalso transiently increase after ingestion of a large amount of dietary meat;\nthus nutrition plays a role in creatinine measurement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidney Failure is not a\nindependent illness,but a series of clinical syndromes caused by various\nreasons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Symptoms of poor kidney function :---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>feeling dehydrated,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>fatigue,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>swelling (edema),<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>shortness of breath,<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>confusion, or<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>many other nonspecific\nsymptoms (for example, nausea, vomiting, neuropathy, and dry skin).</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nimbu, sour lime juice can\nhelp improve kidney filtration rate, so as to eliminate more waste products. Low-protein\nand low-salt diet can help reduce the burden on your kidneys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patients with kidney\ndisease are very prone to high phosphorus and potassium in body, thus, they\nshould limit intake of phosphorus and potassium in daily life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoiding high fat food\nis also necessary for patients with high creatinine and urea level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serum Albumin is a type\nof body protein made from the protein you eat each day.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A low level of albumin\nin your blood may be caused by not getting enough protein or calories from your\ndiet. A low level of albumin may lead to health problems such as difficulty\nfighting off infections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A creatinine clearance\ntest shows how fast your kidneys remove creatinine from the blood. Clearance is\nmeasured in milliliters per minute (ml/min).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To measure your\ncreatinine clearance, you will need to collect urine for 24 hours. Your doctor\nor nurse will give you a container to collect urine and special instructions\nfor timing the 24-hour collection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you take the\ncollected urine to your doctor or laboratory, you will also give a blood sample\nat that time. Your doctor will measure your creatinine clearance by comparing\nthe amount of creatinine in your urine to the amount of creatinine in your\nblood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ojU0AgDm7rk/Vc7p5uRhzGI/AAAAAAAA720/K_2_27WndqY/s1600/imaeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ojU0AgDm7rk/Vc7p5uRhzGI/AAAAAAAA720/K_2_27WndqY/s400/imaeges.jpg\" width=\"331\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">REAL MEN WITH REAL BRUTE STRENGTH DO NOT HAVE BULGING SHOW MUSCLES OR SIX PACKS. &nbsp;</b></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">HOW MANY OF YOU THINK ARNOLD &nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">SCHWARZENEGGER</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;IN HIS PRIME, &nbsp;COULD LIFT EVEN 25% OF&nbsp;WHAT THESE MEN BELOW LIFT&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/7ZBaFKZV8-Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/7ZBaFKZV8-Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For men, a normal\ncreatinine clearance rate is 97 to 137 ml/min. For women, the normal rate is 88\nto 128 ml/min. If your number is below this normal range, your kidneys are not\nworking at full strength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood carries protein\nfor use by cells throughout the body. After the cells use the protein, the\nremaining waste product is returned to the blood as urea, a compound containing\nnitrogen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healthy kidneys take urea out of the blood and send it to the bladder\nin the urine. If your kidneys are not working well, the urea will stay in the\nblood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normal blood contains 7\nto 20 milligrams of urea per deciliter of blood. If your BUN is more than 20\nmg/dl, your kidneys may not be working at full strength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rzg3EcCTxJs/VdAjE658jQI/AAAAAAAA73E/mK1ueECN30A/s1600/sexy-little-mids-muffet-costume-8908.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rzg3EcCTxJs/VdAjE658jQI/AAAAAAAA73E/mK1ueECN30A/s640/sexy-little-mids-muffet-costume-8908.jpg\" width=\"494\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have something\nypu must throw away into the garbage bin, what do you do if you are slimy?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will sing the praises of the GARBAGE-- and say it is worth its weight on gold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Likewise with WHEY.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7kWADO27deQ/VdAleVmXk1I/AAAAAAAA738/W0MAOMc01lE/s1600/buff_misrs_muffet_by_califjenni3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7kWADO27deQ/VdAleVmXk1I/AAAAAAAA738/W0MAOMc01lE/s400/buff_misrs_muffet_by_califjenni3.jpg\" width=\"316\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEY was eaten by poor\npeople like how poor people scrounged into waste bins of meat shops and ate neck\nof chicken and cow intestine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The nursery rhyme about LITTLE MISS MUFFET WAS ALL ABOUT EXTREME SARCASM -- &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cw-k8aD4zG0/VdAmMlWKPTI/AAAAAAAA74E/DISgRDYssrI/s1600/maxresdFefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cw-k8aD4zG0/VdAmMlWKPTI/AAAAAAAA74E/DISgRDYssrI/s640/maxresdFefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IRISH COULD NOT AFFORD CHEESE, THEY COULD AFFORD ONLY DISPOSED OFF ( INTO THE GUTTER ) WHEY&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whey has gone from\nbeing a waste product from cheesemaking to a highly valued coproduct<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whey is the watery\nliquid that remains after the coagulation of the casein proteins in\ncheesemaking.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whey contains most of the lactose and about 18 % of the protein\nin milk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Traditionally, every\nwestern cheesemaker considered whey a waste product and looked for the most\neconomical way to dispose of it. &nbsp;They even\npaid to dispose it off .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KhCJLAwevHw/VdAj0zc_6SI/AAAAAAAA73U/B3bIigrPLAY/s1600/docwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KhCJLAwevHw/VdAj0zc_6SI/AAAAAAAA73U/B3bIigrPLAY/s400/docwnload.jpg\" width=\"389\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally, they\ndiscarded it in one of three ways:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Discharged clandestinely\ninto waterways.-you get caught, you get heavily fined as it swamps the\nenvironment and robs oxygen off water .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sprayed onto to farmland\n( a limited amount only-- if neighbours do NOT complain of YUCK smell and the\nacid in whey does NOT allow you to cultivate what you want ) .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qDDYAmOhukk/VdAlRv9y0NI/AAAAAAAA730/75rmhbT6cq0/s1600/21335c8668d2b6a294d9fab8f9ad4e5cb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qDDYAmOhukk/VdAlRv9y0NI/AAAAAAAA730/75rmhbT6cq0/s320/21335c8668d2b6a294d9fab8f9ad4e5cb.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sold for a ridiculously\nlow return as PIG animal feed.&nbsp; If there\nare NO pig farms around &nbsp;, you are\nscrewed. They gave bull that whey is better than anti-biotics for them pigs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whey disposal will\nincrease the biological activity and can increase the 'BOD' (Biological Oxygen\nDemand) significantly. In large commercial operations, this can be serious\nenough to strip the oxygen for other animals creating serious die-off or dead\nwatersheds<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EeO3Udo--b0/VdAp2L6DHFI/AAAAAAAA74Y/E3CfiyDKSYU/s1600/iydjemFages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EeO3Udo--b0/VdAp2L6DHFI/AAAAAAAA74Y/E3CfiyDKSYU/s400/iydjemFages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cheesemaking generates\nlarge volumes of whey. About 80% of the volume of milk used to make cheese\nremains as whey. As the dairy industry has grown worldwide, the volumes of whey\nhave increased substantially. Growing concerns about the impact on the\nenvironment prompted governments to impose restrictions on its disposal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-w50r1KrJRBE/VdAkElknnxI/AAAAAAAA73c/Mx-gh7_TRbY/s1600/553689682.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-w50r1KrJRBE/VdAkElknnxI/AAAAAAAA73c/Mx-gh7_TRbY/s400/553689682.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whey is composed of 97%\nwater, plus ash, residual lactose, and whey protiens. In a typical run of milk\nto cheddar cheese:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">97% of the water goes\ninto whey<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">96% of the lactose ends\nup in the whey- Indians are lactose intolerant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So GREEDY Jew cheese\nmanufacturers first started singing the praises of protein in WHEY.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QJP5s9-pJQ8/VdAk5vLgQtI/AAAAAAAA73s/vnQbiuNSm4g/s1600/whey-protein-supplemrents.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">They made whey very\ntasty by infusing artificial sweeteners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Whey is acidic on the\npH scale .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the whey\nprotiens sold in health food stores comes from New Zealand and Australia , from\nthe toxic A1 milk of humpless cow. &nbsp;&nbsp;New\nZealand is a country where 22% of their GDP comes from the dairy industry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Whey propaganda\nindustry went on over drive.&nbsp; The protein\nindustry became so huge that it nearly overcame the cheesemaking side of the\nbusiness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, there\u2019s such a large\ndemand for industrial whey protein (check ingredient labels on health foods and\nyou\u2019ll see it everywhere), that marginal cheese has become the by-product and\nwhey the primary product for some large-scale cheesemakers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So garbage bin material\nis now highly values food thanks to a whey lobby who are singing all the way to\nthe bank.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whey protein is&nbsp; safe only in limited quantities over a short\nperiod as it is bad&nbsp; for kidney and liver\nhealth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two types of\nproteins in milk \u2013 the whey class and the casein class. Whey proteins have\nmore&nbsp; amino acids.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
