text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/T7MaRB5dGR0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/T7MaRB5dGR0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Photosensitive cells in\nthe eye directly affect the brain\u2019s hypothalamus region, which controls our\nbiological clock. This influences our circadian rhythm, not just important for\njet lag but for normal sleep patterns, hormone regulation, increased reaction\ntime, and behavior.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most cells in the body have an important cyclic pattern\nwhen working optimally, so potentially, just about any area of the body can falter\nwithout adequate sun stimulation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypothalamus also regulates the combined\nactions of the nervous and hormonal systems Turn down the lights at sunset,\nespecially LED lights which mimic natural sunlight.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blue light is emitted\nfrom mobile phones, computers, tablets, televisions and the lighting inside\nyour home.&nbsp; Pure red light has the least\nimpact on circadian rhythms and melatonin..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Greedy Zionist\ncompanies fit blue lights in your windowless office . Short-wavelength portion\nof the visible spectrum supports alertness and productivity--&nbsp; by suppressing the natural hormone melatonin\nand to stimulate the horomone seratonin. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When our circadian\nrhythms, get disrupted, it can affect our REM sleep .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3p9FcEm3UVU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3p9FcEm3UVU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: I own amber shades. In my bunglow I do NOT use flourescent lights or white/ blue lights at night. &nbsp;Our lights are all &nbsp;golden.</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cXziHBsyaJo/VbSuNGyR2DI/AAAAAAAA7d8/MiI4dtKm26A/s1600/maxresdefaul2Dt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cXziHBsyaJo/VbSuNGyR2DI/AAAAAAAA7d8/MiI4dtKm26A/s640/maxresdefaul2Dt.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chickens naturally lay\neggs during the spring and summer when the days are long. Their internal clocks\ntell them that this is the best time to raise their young.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can trick them\ninto laying eggs year round by setting up a light on a timer in their coop.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp;Dimwits who get fooled by their company to sit in windowless offices fitted with blue LED lights are NO different from the CHOOTIYA chicken below-- &nbsp; who lays more eggs for their greedy owner. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;If you eat this hen or her eggs you will die fast.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6nYrZmFu44c/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6nYrZmFu44c?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bad lighting can cause\neye strain, fatigue and low morale for workers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM SURE THE CHICKEN\nLAYING EGGS TWICE A DAY WILL NOT BE HAVING VERY HIGH MORALE- THEY WOULD BE\nFEELING WORSE THAN A MIDDLE AGED WOMAN WITH PMS . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And when looking at\ncomputer screens and reading documents with dismal lighting, more mistakes are\nmade. This can make them grumpy at work, and just as a smile is contagious, so\nis grumpiness. Who wants to go to a workplace, where everyone seems to be in a GP ( GAAND\nPHAAD )&nbsp;&nbsp;mood?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People are just happier\nwhen they have the sun shining on them, especially in the relatively cold\nregions or weathers.&nbsp; Everyone feels good\nabout coming to work to an office flooded with good daylight . &nbsp;&nbsp;Having natural light will increase their\ncreativity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of artificially\nboosting workplace energy levels with caffeine and sugar-filled drinks, the\nmost effective and affordable way to increase office output it to create an\nenergy efficient environment that uses natural lighting as its primary light\nsource.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Harsh lighting\u2019\nproduced by artificial lights raises cortisol levels \u2013 like them stressed out\nchicken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Much like artificial\nlight increases the body\u2019s production of cortisol, natural light is one of the\nmost effective triggers for increased production of healthy vitamins and\nhormones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When exposed to\nartificial lighting for long periods of time, the body increases its cortisol\noutput.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When exposed to natural light on a rhythm determined by the sun, the\nbody\u2019s cortisol output decreases, reducing stress levels as it declines.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since\nelevated cortisol levels can cause serious medical effects, ranging from muscle\nwasting to early-onset facial aging produced by collagen depletion, adding a\nnatural light source to your office is a fantastic way to improve your health\nand wellbeing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blue light is now being\nused in high end cars and dreamliners to help drivers and pilots stay awake at\nthe wheel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are gonna use\nthe computer late at night before you sleep install software on your computer-that\ncuts blue glare later in the day<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And make sure you make\nyour bedroom dark or sleep in a face mask.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Short-wavelength or\n\u201cblue\u201d light is the most melatonin-suppressive; this is the type of light\ntypically emitted by devices such as televisions, computer screens, and\ncellphones.&nbsp; To produce white light,\nthese electronic devices must emit light at short wavelengths, close to the\npeak sensitivity of melatonin suppression.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means that products such as tablets, smartphones, and other devices\nwith self-luminous electronic displays are major sources for suppressing\nmelatonin at night, thereby reducing sleep duration and disrupting sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/_WYNYU9kCto/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/_WYNYU9kCto?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-Xj7XDT6UNk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-Xj7XDT6UNk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blocking blue light has\nbeen shown in several studies to be extremely effective in reducing the\nmelatonin-suppressing effects of intense and/or blue light. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use amber-lensed\ngoggles once the sun has gone down. These blue-blocking lenses are highly\neffective in reducing the effects of blue light exposure, and in most cases\ncompletely eliminate the short-wavelength radiation necessary for nocturnal\nmelatonin suppression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These goggles have been\nshown to improve sleep quality as well as mood, simply by blocking blue light\nand simulating physiologic darkness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amber-colored goggles\nare one of the only tools available to completely eliminate all blue light\nexposure at night, without \u2018going off the grid\u2019 and powering down your entire\nhouse after 7 PM\u2014if you are stuck with a home fitted with blue emitting lights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR MY SON'S\nPRE-WEDDING NIGHT PARTY , I HAD FITTED THE PANDAL WITH BLUE LIGHTS TO MAKE THE\nHAPPY SEROTONIN HORMONE FLOW.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EQs_KGLf2oo/VbTafPZ27aI/AAAAAAAA7es/qQqogckOLts/s1600/Discount-6M-x3M-LED-Decorative-Lgrrights-Christmas-Outdoor-Decoration-White-Blue-LED-Curtain-Light-22.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"233\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EQs_KGLf2oo/VbTafPZ27aI/AAAAAAAA7es/qQqogckOLts/s640/Discount-6M-x3M-LED-Decorative-Lgrrights-Christmas-Outdoor-Decoration-White-Blue-LED-Curtain-Light-22.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blue light, stimulates &nbsp;connections between areas of the brain\ninvolved in processing emotion and language.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TSvZKRUXTp8/VbTXw-ThS4I/AAAAAAAA7eY/1G69Tcqhe8w/s1600/downlhoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TSvZKRUXTp8/VbTXw-ThS4I/AAAAAAAA7eY/1G69Tcqhe8w/s400/downlhoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exposure to sunlight by\nSuryanamaskar &nbsp;in the morning is\nparticularly effective; it leads to earlier melatonin onset in the evening and\nmakes it easier to fall asleep. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j0EdKkjg6j8/VbTYihpXEFI/AAAAAAAA7eg/lxeFxwVRZLc/s1600/imabgges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-j0EdKkjg6j8/VbTYihpXEFI/AAAAAAAA7eg/lxeFxwVRZLc/s400/imabgges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Artificial lighting\nisn't new, but the lighting emitted by older sources, such as incandescent\nbulbs, use red wavelengths to produce light, while the newer energy efficient\nLED lighting produces a blue light that is much stronger and brighter.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;LED lights are more efficient than fluorescent\nlights, but they are guilty of producing more &nbsp;amount of light in the blue spectrum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/sijvwheJUrM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/sijvwheJUrM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blue wavelengths\u2014which\nare beneficial during daylight hours because they boost attention, reaction\ntimes, and mood , are most disruptive at night. &nbsp;&nbsp;Proliferation of electronics with screens, as\nwell as energy-efficient lighting, is increasing our exposure to blue\nwavelengths, especially after sundown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LED lights have been\ntouted as a super-efficient alternative to traditional bulbs because they use\nup to 85 per cent less energy and each bulb can last up to 10 years. LED bulbs\ncan damage the cells in the retina.&nbsp;&nbsp; It\nis high time these lights are banned unless they are fitted with a filter.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6ZXFVnYfztI/VbTV8rA-1xI/AAAAAAAA7eM/fjW4d1DZBTY/s1600/led-eyhe-300x180.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6ZXFVnYfztI/VbTV8rA-1xI/AAAAAAAA7eM/fjW4d1DZBTY/s400/led-eyhe-300x180.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Researchers have\nexperimented on&nbsp; 7 hours of exposure to\nblue light to exposure to green light of comparable brightness. The blue light\nsuppressed melatonin for about twice as long as the green light and shifted\ncircadian rhythms by twice as much (3 hours vs. 1.5 hours). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shift workers at night\nmust protect themselves by wearing shades that&nbsp;\nblock blue light<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exposure to even small\namounts of light from a television, your computer, tablet, or smartphone can\ninterfere with your body\u2019s production of melatonin, which helps regulate your\nsleep-wake cycle. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep in complete\ndarkness at home. . Move all electrical devices including mobile phone chargers\nat least three feet away from your bed.&nbsp;\nA gauss meter is required if you want to measure EMF levels in various\nareas of your home. If possible install a kill switch to turn off all\nelectricity to your bedroom. If you need a clock, use a battery-operated one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Install a low-wattage\nyellow, orange, or red light bulb if you need a source of light for navigation\nat night. Light in these bandwidths does not shut down melatonin production in\nthe way that white and blue bandwidth light does.&nbsp;&nbsp; Keep the temperature in your bedroom no\nhigher than 23 deg C<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take a hot bath 90\nminutes before bedtime. This increases your core body temperature, and when you\nget out of the bath it abruptly drops, signaling your body that you are ready\nto sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid using loud alarm\nclocks. Being jolted awake each morning can be very stressful. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Artificial blue light\nmeans extension of daylight hours through indoor lighting , which suppresses\nproduction of melatonin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you watch too much television\nat night, wear blue blocking amber sun glasses ( improves REM sleep).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The key to quality REM\nsleep is optimizing the secretion of melatonin, the hormone that influences\nsleep the most. As daylight dims so does our energy as less essential chemicals\nfor activity are produced. This causes our core temperature to fall. It is at\nthis point the body starts to convert serotonin into melatonin. As melatonin\nlevels gradually increase we start to tire as our body prepares for sleep<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SCN takes the information\nfrom the retina on the light levels, and their duration, and passes it to the\npineal gland. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pineal gland is\nresponsible for the secretion of melatonin. However artificial lighting\ndisrupts this process which can result in the pineal gland misinterpreting the\ntime of day and confuses our circadian rhythm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why spending a lot of\ntime under artificial light can have adverse effects on our health. Good\nlighting should therefore follow the patterns and rhythms of natural light.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yFkSZTsHa-c/VbUIaZ6jhCI/AAAAAAAA7fE/dSZ4ZUE9sdY/s1600/imag5es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"262\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yFkSZTsHa-c/VbUIaZ6jhCI/AAAAAAAA7fE/dSZ4ZUE9sdY/s400/imag5es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />###################</o:p><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c105197209132909668\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\">XX</cite><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/10/sesame-seed-sweat-of-lord-vishnu-capt.html?showComment=1437923019123#c105197209132909668\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 26, 2015 at 8:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHello Sir,<br />\n<br />\nCan you please suggest some cure for eczema ? How to prevent it</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_72BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_71T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_72b+seedSvTeD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_71TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_72b+seedSvTeD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_71TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_72b+seedSvTeD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1666627549342123934\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/10/sesame-seed-sweat-of-lord-vishnu-capt.html?showComment=1437927345521#c1666627549342123934\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 26, 2015 at 9:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_71MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi r,<br />\n<br />\nPUT VIRGIN COCONUT OIL ON AFFECTED PARTS AND DO SURYA NAMASKAR FOR VITAMIN D.<br />\n<br />\nTO REMOVE OIL DURING BATH APPLY LIGHT PASTE OF MOONG POWDER MIXED WITH FRESH TURMERIC PASTE.<br />\n<br />\nHAVE A GLUTEN FREE DIET \u2013 HAVE RICE , NOT WHEAT.<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/allergy-overkill-response-of-squeamish.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/allergy-overkill-response-of-squeamish.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nEczema symptoms include itchy, red, and dry skin caused by inflammation. It\u2019s most commonly found in children, although adults can get it. It is also called atopic dermatitis and is treated with oral medications, hydrocortisone steroid creams and sunlight light therapy .<br />\n<br />\nAlmost always, your skin will itch before a rash appears in eczema.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPatches of chronically itchy, dry, thickened skin, usually on the hands, neck, face, and legs (but it can occur anywhere). In children, the inner creases of the knees and elbows are often involved.<br />\n<br />\nIf scratched, dry patches of skin and open sores with crusts may develop and may get infected.<br />\n<br />\nYou develop yellowish to light brown crust or pus-filled blisters over existing patches of eczema. This may indicate a bacterial infection that should be treated with an antibiotic.<br />\n<br />\nEczema is a term for a group of medical conditions that cause the skin to become inflamed or irritated. The most common type of eczema is known as atopic dermatitis, or atopic eczema.<br />\n<br />\nAtopic refers to a group of diseases with an often inherited tendency to develop other allergic conditions, such as asthma and hay fever.<br />\n<br />\nMost infants who develop the condition outgrow it by their tenth birthday, while some people continue to have symptoms on and off throughout life.<br />\n<br />\nEczema inked to an overactive response by the body's immune system to an irritant. It is this response that causes the symptoms of eczema.<br />\n<br />\nStress may cause the condition to worsen.<br />\n<br />\nThe condition is not contagious and can't be spread from person to person.. While there are no tests to determine eczema, most often your doctor can tell if it's eczema by looking at your skin<br />\n<br />\nThe goal of treatment for eczema is to relieve and prevent itching, which can lead to infection.<br />\n<br />\nSince the disease makes skin dry and itchy, lotions and creams are recommended to keep the skin moist.<br />\n<br />\nOther treatments include antihistamines to lessen severe itching,<br />\n<br />\nSome skin creams work by altering the immune system response to prevent flare-ups-but they cause cancer too.<br />\n<br />\nEczema outbreaks can sometimes be avoided or the severity lessened by following these simple tips:---<br />\n<br />\nMoisturize frequently.<br />\nAvoid sudden changes in temperature or humidity.<br />\nAvoid sweating or overheating.<br />\nReduce stress.<br />\nAvoid scratchy materials, such as wool.<br />\nAvoid harsh soaps, detergents, and solvents.<br />\nBe aware of any foods that may cause an outbreak and avoid those foods.<br />\n<br />\nThere is no cure for eczema, in western medicine<br />\n<br />\nSome of the most common allergens that can be causes of eczema include:<br />\n<br />\nHouse dust mites<br />\nPets<br />\nPollens (seasonal)<br />\nMolds<br />\nDandruff<br />\n<br />\nMAKE SURE YOUR BED ROOM ALLOWS SUNLIGHT. PUT YOUR MATTRESS, BLANKETS , PILLOWS IN THE SUN OFTEN.<br />\n<br />\nTake warm baths on a regular basis and immediately apply virgin coconut oil.<br />\n<br />\nWear cotton or soft fabrics.<br />\n<br />\nApply coconut oil within 3 minutes after bathing to \u201clock in\u201d moisture.<br />\nUse a humidifier in dry or cold weather.<br />\nKeep your fingernails short to help keep scratching from breaking the skin.<br />\n<br />\nAgain, do NOT have carpets in your bedroom or pets.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_72b+seedSvTeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_72b+seedSvTeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only stupid people say\nthat you have taken in too much of Vitamin D by sunlight due to Suryanamaskar. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With sunlight-generated vitamin D, you don't\nhave to worry about having too much D in your system, as sunlight destroys any\nexcess vitamin D that it generates in your skin . Just like a mobile phone\nbattery it just charges your body.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B7ZBcLh3iRA/VbV_KuKk2dI/AAAAAAAA7fY/tmcrFjy1sAQ/s1600/vitamin-d-and-car5BGdiology-29-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B7ZBcLh3iRA/VbV_KuKk2dI/AAAAAAAA7fY/tmcrFjy1sAQ/s640/vitamin-d-and-car5BGdiology-29-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neurological,\ncardiovascular, and immune diseases are associated with \u201csunshine vitamin\u201d vitamin\nD deficiency. By increasing your exposure to sunlight, you can decrease your\nrisk for these diseases. Many diseases which modern doctors call \u201c genetic \u201c\ncan be cured by Surya Namaskar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-C35jBfCTN4A/VbV_2H1SuvI/AAAAAAAA7fg/nXI_36Cy0MM/s1600/asthma%2Bchart%2BShept%2B2011.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"500\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-C35jBfCTN4A/VbV_2H1SuvI/AAAAAAAA7fg/nXI_36Cy0MM/s640/asthma%2Bchart%2BShept%2B2011.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The west has taken to\nSurya Namaskar in a big way. Among my 889 posts , the one of Surya Namaskar has\nthe highest view count and that too 93% foreigners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kjcfauvCDGU/VbWAYZ9eqnI/AAAAAAAA7fo/CerTnQ5QSj0/s1600/Vitami5n-D.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"476\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kjcfauvCDGU/VbWAYZ9eqnI/AAAAAAAA7fo/CerTnQ5QSj0/s640/Vitami5n-D.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<o:p>\n\n</o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without vitamin D, your\nbody can\u2019t perform at its best.&nbsp; Sunlight\ncomprises two types of solar radiation: UVA, which causes reddening and burning\nof the skin, and UVB. &nbsp;&nbsp;The latter\nincreases the production of an inactive form or precursor of vitamin D by the\nskin, which is then activated by the liver and kidneys.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-isGiRC8tbEI/VbWBNpF2D7I/AAAAAAAA7fw/3Q4MnxjjrpY/s1600/bonekey2t013213-f1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"560\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-isGiRC8tbEI/VbWBNpF2D7I/AAAAAAAA7fw/3Q4MnxjjrpY/s640/bonekey2t013213-f1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D comes in two\nforms:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D2: The form\nfound in plants (also called ergocalciferol)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D3: The form\nfound in animals (also called cholecalciferol)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both forms of vitamin D\nare created when the ultraviolet rays of the sun act upon a form of\ncholesterol. &nbsp;&nbsp;In certain plants, the\nultraviolet rays convert a molecule called ergosterol into vitamin D2.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nhumans, vitamin D starts as a substance in the skin called\n7-dehydrocholesterol. The ultraviolet B (UVB) rays from the sun convert\n7-dehydrocholesterol into vitamin D3.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nZo9n5eS0uw/VbWBv74dy3I/AAAAAAAA7f8/sLBzmndD9Xs/s1600/fendo-03-0g0058-g001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"520\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nZo9n5eS0uw/VbWBv74dy3I/AAAAAAAA7f8/sLBzmndD9Xs/s640/fendo-03-0g0058-g001.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A vitamin is a chemical\nthat\u2019s essential for your body but that your body can\u2019t make; it must be\ningested. &nbsp;By this definition, vitamin D\nisn\u2019t a vitamin at all. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your\nskin can make vitamin D when it\u2019s exposed to sunlight, so your body doesn\u2019t have\nto acquire it from food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If vitamin D isn\u2019t\nreally a vitamin, what is it? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It becomes a hormone\ncalled calcitriol (active vitamin D) after your body metabolizes it. A hormone\nis a chemical in your body that regulates your physiology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, neither\nvitamin D nor vitamin D3 are active yet. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, vitamin D does nothing by itself;\nit\u2019s completely inactive.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D travels\nthrough the bloodstream to the liver, where it\u2019s turned into\n25-hydroxycholecalciferol (25(OH)D or calcidiol). &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a prohormone or\nprecursor for the vitamin D hormone.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vitamin D\nprohormone travels through the bloodstream to the kidneys, where it\u2019s turned\ninto the active form, 1,25-dihydroxycholecalciferol (1,25(OH)2 D3 or\ncalcitriol). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1,25(OH)2 D3 is the\nactive vitamin D hormone. It is released back into the bloodstream where it\nthen regulates how your body uses calcium and phosphorus.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-abuANO9c9fc/VbWCjM6eVZI/AAAAAAAA7gE/zhadHC96Ybk/s1600/i7mages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-abuANO9c9fc/VbWCjM6eVZI/AAAAAAAA7gE/zhadHC96Ybk/s640/i7mages.png\" width=\"186\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">D3 is two or three\ntimes as potent in raising the level of 25-hydroxycholecalciferol.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the liver and\nthe kidneys are involved in the production of calcitriol, diseases of these\norgans may affect your ability to make this hormone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JzSqzvDF0TY/VbWDpHDaXQI/AAAAAAAA7gQ/q8VN4KynoYI/s1600/097fig01.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JzSqzvDF0TY/VbWDpHDaXQI/AAAAAAAA7gQ/q8VN4KynoYI/s640/097fig01.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidneys produce most of\nthe calcitriol that ends up in the blood. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best understood\nrole for calcitriol is in the control of how your body uses calcium and\nphosphorus to make strong bones. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intestine and bones\nrely on the kidneys to make and ship calcitriol to them. Other organs may be\nable to make small amounts of calcitriol on their own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bcDmliaBYdQ/VbWETgBzL8I/AAAAAAAA7gY/sRSU1Jc4L_8/s1600/vitamin-d-metaybolism.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bcDmliaBYdQ/VbWETgBzL8I/AAAAAAAA7gY/sRSU1Jc4L_8/s320/vitamin-d-metaybolism.gif\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D receptor is\nfound in several cells that are critical for controlling the metabolism of\ncalcium, phosphorus, and bone: intestinal cells, bone cells, kidney cells, and\nparathyroid gland cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lKRpha4io8s/VbWFT4pzSCI/AAAAAAAA7gk/YSLlFx1rLVw/s1600/imafges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"246\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lKRpha4io8s/VbWFT4pzSCI/AAAAAAAA7gk/YSLlFx1rLVw/s400/imafges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Active vitamin D works\nby entering cells and attaching to a protein called the vitamin D receptor,\nlocated in the nucleus of cells, where the genetic material is located. This\ncombination of calcitriol and its receptor stimulates the cell to make proteins\nthat regulate the way the body works.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of the proteins\nproduced in response to calcitriol in the intestine help transport calcium\nacross the intestine and into the bloodstream, greatly increasing the\nabsorption of calcium from the diet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vitamin D receptors\nalso are present in most other tissues, including the brain, heart, skin, ovary\nand testicle, prostate gland, and breast, as well as the cells of the immune system,\nincluding white blood cells and other key immune cells.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lJIS1uayZsM/VbWGB3rey8I/AAAAAAAA7gs/75Wsle46q1s/s1600/vitd-fig3-la3rge.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lJIS1uayZsM/VbWGB3rey8I/AAAAAAAA7gs/75Wsle46q1s/s640/vitd-fig3-la3rge.gif\" width=\"610\" /></a></div>\n<o:p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin;\">Low vitamin D levels exposes you to type 2\ndiabetes.&nbsp;</span></o:p><br />\n<o:p><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 18.3999996185303px;\"><br /></span></span></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tgL7R8Q9kno/VbWG1iE_7cI/AAAAAAAA7g4/nHywMpDvqGI/s1600/vita4min-d-for-life.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tgL7R8Q9kno/VbWG1iE_7cI/AAAAAAAA7g4/nHywMpDvqGI/s640/vita4min-d-for-life.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the sun shines on\nthe skin, the nerve endings absorb energy and send it throughout the entire\nbody. &nbsp;This calms the nerves. when the\nsun hits your skin it manufactures vitamin D in your body and then works as a\ngreat natural aid to calcium absorption. Calcium soothes the nervous system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qhlKh9SO-6M/VbWHOqxdkrI/AAAAAAAA7hA/6AeyZH6CpWw/s1600/ima7ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qhlKh9SO-6M/VbWHOqxdkrI/AAAAAAAA7hA/6AeyZH6CpWw/s640/ima7ges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sunlight is one of the\ngreatest sleep inducers, especially when you combine it with any form of\nphysical exercise. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sunlight is the\nmajor source of vitamin D-producing Ultraviolet B radiation, which has a wide\nrange of positive health effects, including possibly inhibiting the growth of\nsome cancers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Mzyz52O_oNk/VbWHy0w8nXI/AAAAAAAA7hI/QnigyTleMRw/s1600/Inter7actions-of-Calcium-and-Vitamin-D-Explained-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Mzyz52O_oNk/VbWHy0w8nXI/AAAAAAAA7hI/QnigyTleMRw/s640/Inter7actions-of-Calcium-and-Vitamin-D-Explained-2.jpg\" width=\"542\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 18.3999996185303px;\"><br /></span></span></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To make vitamin D, you\nneed UV-B rays to come into direct contact with your skin. UV-B rays cannot\npenetrate glass, so you don't make any vitamin D while you're sitting in a car\nor by a window at work or at home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vLhMoutVkn8/VbWIdgoF4LI/AAAAAAAA7hQ/j6x5qsfAoGQ/s1600/1280px-Ozone_altitude_UV_graphsDS.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vLhMoutVkn8/VbWIdgoF4LI/AAAAAAAA7hQ/j6x5qsfAoGQ/s400/1280px-Ozone_altitude_UV_graphsDS.svg.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normal glass blocks all\nof UVB but allows UVA to come through. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies manufacture\nvitamin D when the sun's ultraviolet B (UVB) rays interact with\n7-dehydrocholesterol (7-DHC) present in the skin.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8Okq6fyU2JU/VbWJXMEzqaI/AAAAAAAA7hc/ZZkhXTZNThc/s1600/imy2ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8Okq6fyU2JU/VbWJXMEzqaI/AAAAAAAA7hc/ZZkhXTZNThc/s400/imy2ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lighter skin color\nallows deeper penetration by UV-B rays, which decreases the amount of sunlight\nexposure needed for adequate vitamin D production.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C7bZ8ZLkykU/VbWKJYHLOwI/AAAAAAAA7hs/F6LqMUlawA8/s1600/vitdcghart.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"506\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C7bZ8ZLkykU/VbWKJYHLOwI/AAAAAAAA7hs/F6LqMUlawA8/s640/vitdcghart.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have darker skin,\nit's harder for UV-B rays to penetrate your skin and create vitamin D, which\nmeans that you need greater exposure to sunlight than someone with lighter\nskin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pLJV6eE_BLI/VbWJzm6fGvI/AAAAAAAA7hk/dBihtvUej30/s1600/im74ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pLJV6eE_BLI/VbWJzm6fGvI/AAAAAAAA7hk/dBihtvUej30/s400/im74ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The further north or\nsouth you live from the equator, the less exposure you have to UV-B rays.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The higher you live\nabove sea level, the greater exposure you have to UV-B rays. With each passing\nyear, natural degenerative changes that occur in your skin make it harder for\nUV-B rays to convert cholesterol in your skin into vitamin D. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ja9svOEy1I4/VbWS2qWPLlI/AAAAAAAA7iQ/EcT3kcrBlYw/s1600/imageYs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ja9svOEy1I4/VbWS2qWPLlI/AAAAAAAA7iQ/EcT3kcrBlYw/s400/imageYs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At 70 years of age, the\naverage person has approximately 30% of the capacity to generate vitamin D from\nsunlight that a 20-year old has.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having enough vitamin D\nin your body is essential to reducing your risk of every disease that we know\nof. &nbsp;Every single one, read again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W6uwWlKyQJc/VbWRwCfyywI/AAAAAAAA7iI/NuRcV5byiMA/s1600/vitamiGn-d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W6uwWlKyQJc/VbWRwCfyywI/AAAAAAAA7iI/NuRcV5byiMA/s640/vitamiGn-d.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<o:p><br /></o:p>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In particular, vitamin\nD deficiency is strongly linked to increased risk of experiencing the\nfollowing:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cancers of the breast,\novary, prostate, colon, esophagus, pancreas, and leukemia. Eighty-one percent of\nbabies born to women who were vitamin D deficient were deficient themselves,\npredisposing them to diabetes type 1, multiple sclerosis, schizophrenia,\nrickets, and a number of other diseases &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western girls having Vitamin D deficiency get\nearly menses.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-x6DCEr8Ah9M/VbWMgnetvMI/AAAAAAAA7h4/Qb-PqtlythY/s1600/imaftes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-x6DCEr8Ah9M/VbWMgnetvMI/AAAAAAAA7h4/Qb-PqtlythY/s1600/imaftes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you're obese, you need\nto get more vitamin D than non-obese people, as obesity is a risk factor for\nvitamin D deficiency.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reason is that vitamin D gets trapped within fat\ntissue and can have some difficulty leaving to enter your bloodstream to supply\nthe rest of your cells. Because of this, obese patients tend to need at least\ntwice as much vitamin D as non-obese people in order to maintain optimal vitamin\nD status. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But we are bombarded with\nmessages from EVIL PHARMA and GREEDY DOCTORS about how dangerous the sun is. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">####################</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pvVgQIxyplc/VbZcM3gEGUI/AAAAAAAA7i0/MzMbGdjdY3Y/s1600/cholesterol-reducing-oil-fat-in-level-milk-massach23usetts-worcester-30768.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pvVgQIxyplc/VbZcM3gEGUI/AAAAAAAA7i0/MzMbGdjdY3Y/s640/cholesterol-reducing-oil-fat-in-level-milk-massach23usetts-worcester-30768.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7278654456052327848\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_281M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/04737630967923695502\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Adarsh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html?showComment=1437993091708#c7278654456052327848\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 27, 2015 at 4:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_281MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nNamaskar Capt,<br />\n<br />\nI have recently done my Lipid Profile testing and found to have high number in my Triglycerides.<br />\nI am 33 and active , being a typical Malayli i enjoy non-veg and drinks everyweekends.<br />\nPlease advice how can i bring down my Triglycerides count within normal Range.<br />\n<br />\nRegards,<br />\nAdarsh</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_281BR\" style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.3999996185303px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_301T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_301TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<img src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s1600/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /><br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_301B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_281b+seedEsD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1333901683960626764\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_301M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/07/atapa-snana-bathing-home-and-workplace.html?showComment=1438014218116#c1333901683960626764\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 27, 2015 at 9:53 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_301MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">hi a,</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">Triglycerides are a type of fat found in your blood. Your body uses them for energy.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">But high triglycerides might raise your risk of heart disease and may be a sign of metabolic syndrome.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">Metabolic syndrome is the combination of high blood pressure, high blood sugar, too much fat around the waist, low HDL (\"good\") cholesterol, and high triglycerides.
