font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Infrared range that\nspans 700 nm to 1,000,000 nm (1 mm). It is responsible for an important part of\nthe electromagnetic radiation that reaches Earth. It is also divided into three\ntypes on the basis of wavelength:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Infrared-A: 700 nm to\n1,400 nm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Infrared-B: 1,400 nm to\n3,000 nm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Infrared-C: 3,000 nm to\n1 mm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PKKrUqtckqI/VbjfeRpDGmI/AAAAAAAA7p4/lzZnBrZoV48/s1600/greenhouseeffkhbdects.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-PKKrUqtckqI/VbjfeRpDGmI/AAAAAAAA7p4/lzZnBrZoV48/s640/greenhouseeffkhbdects.jpg\" width=\"556\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many animals (including\nhumans) have a sensitivity range of approximately 400\u2013700 nm<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wavelengths cycles are\nmeasured in nanometers (nm) from peak to peak.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shorter the\nwavelength, the more energy it has. Blue light has more energy than red light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solar radiation is\nmeasured in wavelengths or frequency. As light travels in a wave, a wavelength\nis defined as the distance from peak to peak and is measured in nanometers\n(nm). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4uDW51fx7T0/Vbjflpq5FCI/AAAAAAAA7qA/BfyVVjS_naE/s1600/9spectrum.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"441\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4uDW51fx7T0/Vbjflpq5FCI/AAAAAAAA7qA/BfyVVjS_naE/s640/9spectrum.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frequency is defined as\nwavelength cycles per second and is expressed in hertz (Hz). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bands with shorter\nwavelengths produce higher frequencies. Likewise, the longer the wavelength,\nthe longer it will take to complete a cycle, which produces a lower frequency. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shorter wavelengths are\nmore energetic than longer ones.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ui3SEvwhzL8/VbjfzvT4VxI/AAAAAAAA7qI/LDp60VzhaJk/s1600/light-co09rrespond-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"500\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ui3SEvwhzL8/VbjfzvT4VxI/AAAAAAAA7qI/LDp60VzhaJk/s640/light-co09rrespond-2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means that\nultraviolet radiation is more energetic than infrared radiation. &nbsp;&nbsp;Due to this extra energy, shorter wavelengths\ntend to cause more harm than longer wavelengths . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more energy a\nwavelength has, the easier it is to disrupt the molecule that absorbs it.\nUltraviolet light UVA (which has the highest energy) can cause damage to DNA\nand other important cellular structures .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tcsECNXViUY/VbjgEdLGvcI/AAAAAAAA7qQ/pNSBrs2E8fY/s1600/speyectrum.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tcsECNXViUY/VbjgEdLGvcI/AAAAAAAA7qQ/pNSBrs2E8fY/s640/speyectrum.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a body of water,\ninfrared light can only reach a certain distance below the surface. 90% of\ninfrared radiation is absorbed in the first meter of the water\u2019s surface, and\nonly 1% can reach past two meters in pure water.&nbsp; &nbsp;This\nis why the surface of most bodies of water are warmer than the depths.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As visible light\nreaches Earth, a surface will absorb or reflect different wavelengths,\nproducing a visible color. The wavelength reflected by a surface is the color\nthat it appears to be . If the surface reflects all of the visible wavelengths,\nit will appear white..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most plants appear\ngreen as the chlorophyll in their cells reflects green light . Water often\nappears blue as this color travels the deepest before being absorbed. While on\nland, plants use nearly all of the visible range for photosynthesis. However,\neven underwater when only blue light is available, photosynthesis can still\noccur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The leaves of sun\nplants are small and thick, with special cells allowing for these higher rates\n. Shade plants conduct photosynthesis at a lower radiation intensity level.\nTheir leaves are thinner, longer and contain fewer chlorophyll cells. This\nmakes it easier for photosynthesis to occur in low light conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxygen is a byproduct\nof photosynthesis . The process ensures that more oxygen is produced than is\nused up by organisms in the surrounding environment. If photosynthesis does not\nproduce enough dissolved oxygen underwater, it can create anoxic conditions\nwhere fish and other organisms cannot live .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Photosynthesis also consumes\ncarbon dioxide, thus lowering carbon dioxide levels in air and water .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The angle of the sun\ndetermines solar irradiance. The greater the angle, the lower the solar\nintensity. &nbsp;Optimal photosynthetically\nactive radiation is the band from 400-700 nm, which encompasses the visible\nlight spectrum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Visible light is the\nonly band of light on the spectrum to be considered photosynthetically active.\nIt has the perfect amount of energy to excite the electrons needed to start\nphotosynthesis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fish that live near the\nsurface have similar visual abilities to those of organisms on land. &nbsp; Many fish are also equipped with UV vision, giving them an\nopportunity to see animals that are transparent in visible light<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nerve-signaling chemicals called\nneurotransmitters control whether we are asleep or awake by acting on different\ngroups of nerve cells, or neurons, in the brain. Neurons in the brainstem,\nwhich connects the brain with the spinal cord, produce neurotransmitters such\nas serotonin and norepinephrine that keep some parts of the brain active while\nwe are awake.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other neurons at the base of the brain begin signaling when we\nfall asleep. These neurons appear to \"switch off\" the signals that\nkeep us awake. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">You get good REM sleep\nwhen you do Suryanamaskar. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many antidepressants\nsuppress REM sleep.. Many people who suffer from insomnia try to solve the\nproblem with alcohol \u2013 the so-called night cap. While alcohol does help people\nfall into light sleep, it also robs them of REM and the deeper, more\nrestorative stages of sleep. Instead, it keeps them in the lighter stages of\nsleep, from which they can be awakened easily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Infants generally require about 16 hours a\nday, while teenagers need about 9 hours on average. For most adults, 7 to 8\nhours a night appears to be the best amount of sleep.. The amount of sleep a\nperson needs also increases if he or she has been deprived of sleep in previous\ndays.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting too little sleep creates a \"sleep debt,\" which is much\nlike being overdrawn at a bank. Eventually, your body will demand that the debt\nbe repaid. We don't seem to adapt to getting less sleep than we need; while we\nmay get used to a sleep-depriving schedule, our judgment, reaction time, and\nother functions are still impaired.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep stimulates\nthe brain regions used in learning. This may be important for normal brain\ndevelopment during infancy, which would explain why infants spend much more\ntime in REM sleep than adults . &nbsp;REM\nsleep affects learning of certain mental skills. People taught a skill and then\ndeprived of non-REM sleep could recall what they had learned after sleeping,\nwhile people deprived of REM sleep could not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who do NOT get\nproper REM sleep can do PHD in a subject. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;But after a year he has forgotten everything\nhe learnt and is unable to put what he learnt in practice.&nbsp; You can see that most of your bosses belong\nto this category and they illtreat you, so that fear can make you fill up his\nblanks and sustain his job security. &nbsp;Without\nREM sleep you will lack perception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep helps &nbsp;prevent seizures that begin in one part of the\nbrain from spreading to other brain regions, while deep sleep may promote the\nspread of these seizures. Sleep deprivation also triggers seizures in people\nwith some types of epilepsy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with depression\nhave very little REM sleep.&nbsp; They often\nawaken in the early hours of the morning and find themselves unable to get back\nto sleep. The amount of sleep a person gets also strongly influences the\nsymptoms of mental disorders. Sleep deprivation is an effective therapy for\npeople with certain types of depression, while it can actually cause depression\nin other people.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Extreme sleep deprivation can lead to a seemingly psychotic\nstate of paranoia and hallucinations in otherwise healthy people, and disrupted\nsleep can trigger episodes of mania (agitation and hyperactivity) in people\nwith manic depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleeping problems are\ncommon in many other disorders as well, including Alzheimer's disease, stroke,\ncancer, and head injury. These sleeping problems may arise from changes in the\nbrain regions and neurotransmitters that control sleep, or from the drugs used\nto control symptoms of other disorders. In patients who are hospitalized or who\nreceive round-the-clock care, treatment schedules or hospital routines also may\ndisrupt sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The old joke about a patient being awakened by\na nurse so he could take a sleeping pill contains a grain of truth. Our good\nold Florence Nightingale was one such.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-s-ae1oeJpGU/VbkENqqkktI/AAAAAAAA7qw/TaMaMqq9Pp4/s1600/101%2Bsleep%2Bsteages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"564\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-s-ae1oeJpGU/VbkENqqkktI/AAAAAAAA7qw/TaMaMqq9Pp4/s640/101%2Bsleep%2Bsteages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once REM sleeping\nproblems develop, they can add to a person's impairment and cause confusion,\nfrustration, or depression. Patients who are unable to sleep also notice pain\nmore and may increase their requests for pain medication. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Go to bed at a set time\neach night and get up at the same time each morning. Disrupting this schedule\nmay lead to insomnia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We typically enter REM\napproximately 90 minutes after falling asleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first cycle of REM\noften lasts only a short amount of time, but each cycle becomes longer. This is\nwhy we need long periods of sleep each night as most of the REM sleep occurs in\nthe hours before awakening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we get short periods\nof sleep, we can\u2019t really get through the stages we need to heal and stay\nhealthy. When you\u2019re in a rapid eye movement (REM) sleep cycle, your body shuts\ndown the production of norepinephrine, a neurotransmitter that constricts the\nblood vessels leading to your penis. It does this so it can begin the repair\nand rebuilding process of your pipes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So if you miss out on\nthis REM sleep cycle, or fail to stay in it long enough, norepinephrine will\nstay elevated all night long, which will impact your wood the following\nmorning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This happens because\nnorepinephrine constricts blood flow, which prevents the vasodilation of your\ncorpus cavernosa, and if you can\u2019t dilate the cavernosa, you can\u2019t get an\nerection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UdqfERIs4OI/VbkD0tTApxI/AAAAAAAA7qg/g6E9yVT3NDE/s1600/sle704ep-cycle.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"430\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UdqfERIs4OI/VbkD0tTApxI/AAAAAAAA7qg/g6E9yVT3NDE/s640/sle704ep-cycle.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This lack of nighttime\nblood flow will also cause other problems, because the rush of blood into your\npenis at night oxygenates and repairs vascular smooth muscle cells while you\nsleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This process is so hard\nwired into humans, it even happens to women in a process called Nocturnal\nClitoral Tumescence (clitorial erections) when they\u2019re in REM sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Schizophrenia is a\nchronic mental disease that disturbs several cognitive functions, such as\nmemory, thought, perception and volition. Schizophrenia is a disease that\nusually evolves with outbreaks and affects approximately 3% of the western\npopulation due to their decadent lifestyle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hallucinations and\ndelusion are core positive symptoms of schizophrenia has been implicated in\nlack of &nbsp;REM sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wWYX2wNojJY/VbkD6dCbtiI/AAAAAAAA7qo/iuQKIBblGJQ/s1600/imah6ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wWYX2wNojJY/VbkD6dCbtiI/AAAAAAAA7qo/iuQKIBblGJQ/s1600/imah6ges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your children study\nfor their exams in natural daylight bathed rooms, they will score better\ngrades.&nbsp; They must sleep in DARK rooms so\nthat melatonin is secreted for proper REM sleep.&nbsp; Otherwise they will have to revise again and\nagain and go for exams with the felling that they do NOT remember anything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you buy a home\nmake sure that your bed room gets plenty of morning sunshine.&nbsp; Ancient Indian VAASTU considered all this.\nNowadays even Christians and Muslims believe in Vaastu and are willing to spend\nmore money on flats which include elements of Vaastu. &nbsp;This is NOT superstition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Daylight is FREE and an unlimited natural\nresource &nbsp;. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAD or Seasonal\nAffective Disorder, a clinically diagnosed condition in which the lack of\nsunlight in winter makes people feel ill.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Natural light helps people to feel better but it can also aid the\nhealing process.&nbsp; In hospitals, studies\nhave proven that the recovery rate of patients is accelerated where levels of\nnatural light are increased. Looking out at gardens brings faster healing in\npatients,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-luzazNnyK5E/VbniQTInQ6I/AAAAAAAA7sw/O0pmW8Glb3k/s1600/winter-blu89es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-luzazNnyK5E/VbniQTInQ6I/AAAAAAAA7sw/O0pmW8Glb3k/s640/winter-blu89es.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern studies have\nproved that people with seasonal affective disorder, getting a lot of light\nearly in the morning can help reset their internal clock. This is what ancient\nSuryanamaskar is for.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As winter approaches\nand the days get shorter, millions of people once again develop the sadness and\nloss of energy that is characteristic of seasonal affective disorder.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seasonal\naffective disorder is regarded as a kind of major depression and has many of\nthe same symptoms: loss of energy, change in appetite, tendency to oversleep,\ndifficulty concentrating, and irritability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But unlike major\ndepression, it occurs seasonally, usually beginning in September or October and\nlasting through March or April IN North latitude European countries.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x23Ok2tLL7w/Vbnh7-LfIFI/AAAAAAAA7so/sUTFTq83xEc/s1600/seasonv84ariation.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone who has\nsuffered these symptoms for two consecutive winters, but does not have symptoms\nof depression during the spring and summer months, probably has seasonal\naffective disorder. 7% of the white race is affected by seasonal affective\ndisorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body uses serotonin\nin manufacturing melatonin, the chemical that makes us sleepy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concentrations\nof serotonin drop to their lowest levels during the winter and rise to their\nhighest levels in summer and fall.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The eye\nperceives three main colours in light: red, green and blue, each vibrating at a\ndifferent wavelength. In the morning, high concentrations of blue occur\nnaturally; by dusk we are left mostly with green and red.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blue light has\nthe greatest impact on our circadian system, telling the brain that it\u2019s\nmorning and time to be alert, and setting our clock for the day. That is\nimportant because we sleep soundly, and our brain and body function better,\nwhen the internal signals of the body clock are in sync with external cues of\nday and night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The problem is that\nartificial light does not replicate the colours of the natural world. Much\nelectric light has high intensities of blue, so it deceives our brains into\nthinking that it\u2019s daytime even when it isn\u2019t.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our homes could mirror\nthe natural world, with shining blue in the morning, and gentler reds and\ngreens later at night. &nbsp;We do NOT want\nMumbai Irani restaurant type white fluorescent tubelight in our homes. &nbsp;Have you seen any % or 7 star hotel in India\nor abroad having white fluorescent tubelights. &nbsp;My own bungalow has only golden lights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Make sure your toilet\ngets sunlight inside. In olden days our homes has toilets outside with windows\nwhich allowed sunlight in for natural and free disinfection.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water and mold growth\nare interrelated variables, making bathrooms a hot spot for exposure in the\nhome environment.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Although fungal spores are present everywhere,\nit is when dampness and moisture are uncontrolled that fungi grow and develop\ninto visible mold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flushing the toilet\nproduces aerosols that are capable of causing surface contamination within the\ntoilet and bathroom.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Many enteric\npathogens are spread by the fecal-oral transmission route. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Droplets containing\nfecal matter, after toilet flushing, is an infection hazard, particularly\nduring acute diarrheal illnesses. In my bunglow all toilets have the fan exhaust\nattached to the switch \u2013you can put on the light without putting on the exhaust\nfan.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these attached\ntoilet business came with the white invader. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is a statistical\nstudy done in USA<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:-&nbsp; In one particular study of bacterial counts after\ntoilet flushing, the most bacteria was found on the toilet seat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Closing the toilet lid\nhad little effect in reducing the number of bacteria released into the air due\nto gaps between the top of the porcelain rim and the seat.&nbsp; There is also a gap between the seat and the\nlid allowing aerosols to&nbsp; escape into the\nroom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another heavily\ncolonized area was the recess under the rim of the toilet where limescale often\naccumulates, which aids in bacterial retention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of the 100-500 grams of\nfeces excreted per day by the average America, it has been estimated that\napproximately 0.1 gram of residual fecal matter remains on the undergarment of\nany person . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because home machines\nuse water at temperatures of 25-60oC, the water is less effective at killing\nmicrobes. Washing machines are contaminated after use and can spread bacteria,\nsuch as Staphylococcus aureus (a common cause of skin infections), from\nprevious loads to future loads of laundry.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Avoid eating all processed foods and\npackages drinks which have long shelf life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Kf7tk77Lc6s/VbpUPst-NKI/AAAAAAAA7uA/lWZH6WP6HYI/s1600/imaeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"248\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Kf7tk77Lc6s/VbpUPst-NKI/AAAAAAAA7uA/lWZH6WP6HYI/s640/imaeges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ayurveda we soak beans\nand nuts in water before we eat. &nbsp;&nbsp;Soaking\nor sprouting converts starches to sugar, removes phytic acid,&nbsp; which would combine with iron, calcium,\nmagnesium, copper and zinc, blocking their absorption.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/sprouts-of-moong-or-mongo-beans-no-1.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/sprouts-of-moong-or-mongo-beans-no-1.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sunlight lowers\ncholesterol by converting high cholesterol in the blood into steroid hormones.\nIn the absence of sunlight, the opposite happens; substances convert to\ncholesterol.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sunlight builds the\nimmune system. The white blood cells, which increase with sun exposure, are\ncalled lymphocytes, and these play a major role in defending the body against\ninfections. Regular sunlight exposure increases the growth and height of\nchildren, especially babies. Doctors normally recommend newborns to be exposed\nto early morning sunrays.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 6000 year old\nAyurveda &nbsp;the hours between 10 p.m. and 3\na.m. are considered the nighttime rejuvenation cycle and the most essential for\nsleep. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sleep deprivation can increase\nlevels of corticosterone (a stress hormone), resulting in fewer new brain cells\nbeing created in your hippocampus.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cell phones , laptops and\nother forms of technology can actually fool your brain into forgetting it\u2019s\nnighttime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blue light from\nthese devices tells our suprachiasmatic nucleus ( your internal clock) that\nit\u2019s 2:00 in the afternoon, and not 2:00 in the morning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the circadian\nrhythm is out of whack , the timing of hormone release, metabolism, and other\nprocesses may become disturbed - contributing to various disease states.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Keep your cell phone as\nfar from you as possible during sleep. &nbsp;&nbsp;If\nyou use your phone for an alarm, just turn up the volume so you\u2019ll still hear\nit, and also be forced to get up when you need to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sunny day is\nequivalent to about 10,000 lux or higher of light. Indoor office lighting\ntypically provides only about 300 to 500 lux.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of our schools\nhave classrooms with no windows and our children are studying in artificial\nlight with poor &nbsp;ventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;We now have hospitals where the sick are\nsupposed to get well with no fresh air and sunlight whatsoever. There are\noffice buildings where people work all day under artificial light breathing\nartificial air and go home at night feeling totally drained and irritable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Houses and flat look\ninto each other and people do NOT draw open the curtains for privacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVIL people when they\nwant to do evil things use dark caves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zRIYyDtwRO8/Vbpcccn_95I/AAAAAAAA7uQ/DHf_C56dxHk/s1600/100_dofllar_bill.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kuaR9bk4mJ8/Vbpc_4eInvI/AAAAAAAA7uY/zCvBAvzdva0/s1600/i48mage_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kuaR9bk4mJ8/Vbpc_4eInvI/AAAAAAAA7uY/zCvBAvzdva0/s640/i48mage_1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suryanamaskar enhances\nOjas -- the main life-supporting force within your body. According to Ayurveda,\ninsomnia is often caused by being out of sync with nature.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suryanamaskar enhances\nOjas -- the main life-supporting force within your body. According to Ayurveda,\ninsomnia is often caused by being out of sync with nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE GREEKS COPIED FROM\nAYURVEDA AND CLAIMED IT FOR THEMSELVES .&nbsp;\nTHIS IS WHAT THE WHITE MAN HAS DONE SINCE TIME IMMEMORIAL--LIFT FROM\nINDIA AND PATENT THE KNOWLEDGE.&nbsp; ANCIENT\nINDIANS NEVER LEFT THE AUTHORS NAME IN ANY SCRIPTURE, IT WAS CONSIDERED\nIRRELEVANT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pythagoras gave his\nstolen Ayurveda ( excerpts from treatises of Susruta and Charaka ) to the\ngrandfather of Hippocrates. In those days Greeks knew NOTHING of human anatomy\nand physiology because of the strict Greek taboo forbidding the dissection of\nhuman cadavers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates , the\nFATHER OF WESTERN MEDICINE tried to fudge 6000 year old Ayurveda and give it\nhis own spin. After all he was just a spin doctor, whose entire knowledge was\nfrom his grandfather.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Example :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ayurvedic medicine,\nthere are 3 basic temperaments: Vata (gas), Pitta (bile) and Kapha (phlegm).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates ( 460BC-\n370 BC ) threw in one more most STUPID item ( blood\u2014TEE HEEE ) into the\nworks.&nbsp; For in the Sushruta Samhita, it\nis stated that blood ( Rakta ) , is a DHATU&nbsp;\nin Ayurveda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So his fudged treatise\ntalks about - bilious (bile), sanguineous (blood),&nbsp; phlegmatic (phlegm) and atrabiliary (black\nbile).&nbsp; And he removed Vata ( gas ) \u2013the\nmost important one.&nbsp; Show what an amazing\nidiot he is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates the thief\ndid several more spins in medicine-- that body is made of water, air, earth and\nfire.&nbsp; He left out vaccum of Ayurveda .\nIn the Ayurvedic system, body is made of water, air, earth, fire and vacuum.\nDigestion is explained as cooking of food with the help of body-fire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates theory that\nthe human body is a microcosm of the universe is lifted from Ayurveda/\nUpanishads .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Information about\nHippocrates can also be found in the writings of Aristotle, which date from the\n4th century BC.&nbsp; All newly qualified\ndoctors take what is called the \u2018Hippocratic Oath\u2019- NOT knowing that he is NOT\nworth to take an oath on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noting that Pythagoras\ngot himself healed of Epilepsy, Hippocrates was absolutely cock sure of stating\nthat epilepsy is NOT created by the Greek gods- and that like for every other\nillnesses it had a natural cause.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stupid Hippocrates\nwrote that raw food is bad.&nbsp; Cant blame\nhim, after all it was his grandfather who received third party stolen stuff. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hippocrates mistook the\nAyurvedic word&nbsp; AMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ayurvedic word for\ntoxins, ama, means, \"crude\" or \"raw\" - residues from faulty\nor incomplete pepsis that haven't been properly integrated into the body and\nits functioning, and therefore impede it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to minimize\nmelatonin suppression, one should keep exposure to light at night as short as\npossible, as dim as possible, and as warm or red as possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In all environments the\neye and brain functions respond better to natural light, so people perform\nbetter.&nbsp; Natural light increases\nendorphins and serotonin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK PEOPLE WHHO ARE\nFORCED TO WORK IN OFFICES WITHOUT DAYLIGHT, TO PRESENT THEIR MEDICAL BILLS TO\nTHE OWNERS.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_C8hndqjWM8/Vbphi-tkvdI/AAAAAAAA7uk/6a86hEosNlM/s1600/do53wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_C8hndqjWM8/Vbphi-tkvdI/AAAAAAAA7uk/6a86hEosNlM/s400/do53wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Methicillin-resistant\nstaphylococcus aureus MSRA and other other highly infectious bacteria is\nprevalent in many hospitals, where daylight is deficient and the natural\ndisinfecting sunshine is absent.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nbacteria are resistant to&nbsp; commonly\nprescribed antibiotics.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is interesting to reflect that if daylight has such\na dramatic and potent impact on killing streptococci, it\u2019s surprising that its\npotential for reducing super-bug infections in hospitals, has not been fully\ninvestigated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-Kj-qCRLLns/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-Kj-qCRLLns?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sunlight builds the\nimmune system. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Om Jayanti Ma\u1e45gal\u0101 K\u0101l\u012b\nBhadrak\u0101l\u012b Kap\u0101lin\u012b Durg\u0101 K\u1e63am\u0101 \u015aiv\u0101 Dh\u0101tr\u012b Sv\u0101h\u0101 Svadh\u0101 namo'stu te. Om.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conqueror of all,\nremover of darkness, Auspicious one, beyond time, bearer of the Skulls of\nImpure Thoughts, Reliever of difficulties, loving forgiveness, supporter of the\nUniverse. You are the one who truly receives the sacrificial offerings and the\nofferings to the ancestors. To you I bow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Jaya tva\u1e41 Devi ch\u0101mu\u1e47\u1e0de\njaya bh\u016bt\u0101rti-h\u0101ri\u1e47i Jaya sarvagate Devi k\u0101la-r\u0101tr\u012b namo'stu te. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Victory, oh Goddess,\nslayer of passion and anger! Victory, reliever of the troubles of all\nexistence! Victory, all-pervasive Goddess! You are the night at the end of\ntime! To you I bow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Madhu-Kai\u1e6dabha-vidr\u0101vi\nvidh\u0101t\u1e5b varade nama\u1e25 R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You who defeated the\nnegative qualities of excess and sparseness, Giver of the blessings of the\ncreative capacity, to you I bow. Grant us your Form, grant us victory, grant us\nwelfare, destroy all hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4 <span style=\"color: blue;\">Mahi\u1e63\u0101sura-nir\u1e47\u0101\u015bi\nbhakt\u0101n\u0101\u1e41 sukhade nama\u1e25 R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You who caused the\ndestruction Mahi\u1e63\u0101, Giver of happiness to devotees, to you I bow. Grant us your\nForm, grant us victory, grant us welfare, destroy all hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Raktab\u012bja-vadhe Devi\nCa\u1e47\u1e0da-Mu\u1e47\u1e0da-vin\u0101\u015bini R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You who slew the demons\nRaktab\u012bja, Ca\u1e47\u1e0da and Mu\u1e47\u1e0da, Oh Goddess, destroyer of passion and anger. Grant\nus your Form, grant us victory, grant us welfare, destroy all hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">\u015aumbhasyaiva\nni\u015bumbhasya Dh\u016bmr\u0101k\u1e63asya ca mardini R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi.</span>\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slayer of the demons\n\u015aumbha, Ni\u015bumbha and Dh\u016bmalocana. Grant us your Form, grant us victory, grant\nus welfare, destroy all hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Vandit\u0101\u1e45ghri-yuge Devi\nsarva-saubh\u0101gya-d\u0101yini R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All revere your lotus\nfeet, Oh Goddess, Giver of all that is beautiful. Grant us your Form, grant us\nvictory, grant us welfare, destroy all hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Acintya-r\u016bpa-carite\nsarva-\u015batru-vin\u0101\u015bini R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You of unimaginably\nbeautiful form and energy, Destroyer of all obstacles, remover of all\nafflictions. Grant us your Form, grant us victory, grant us welfare, destroy\nall hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Natebhya\u1e25 sarvad\u0101\nbhaktya Ca\u1e47\u1e0dike durit\u0101pahe R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o jahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For those who bow to\nyou with devotion, You remove all sins and distress. Grant us your Form, grant\nus victory, grant us welfare, destroy all hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Stuvadbhyo\nbhakti-p\u016brvam tv\u0101m Ca\u1e47\u1e0dike vy\u0101dhi-n\u0101\u015bini R\u016bpa\u1e43 dehi jaya\u1e43 dehi ya\u015bo dehi dvi\u1e63o\njahi. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh Goddess who cures\nall afflictions for those who praise you with devotion. when the night of Brahma comes, these forms\nmerge in the Formless again. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u3U6hlaP5RY/VaHl8E-6SZI/AAAAAAAA7UI/f65PeOaKdjk/s1600/news-comet-impract.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u3U6hlaP5RY/VaHl8E-6SZI/AAAAAAAA7UI/f65PeOaKdjk/s640/news-comet-impract.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Current paleontological\nevidence reveals that every 26 million years there is a mass extinction of\nspecies on the earth\u2014actually the number should be averaged to 24 million . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zAPzjw-R3-s/VaDW-jEokwI/AAAAAAAA7Nk/Kg4wZzK29kk/s1600/SoljgvfTwaitn450.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paleontologists who hav</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;lift</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">d from the Vedas have written that mass extinctions occur in a regular\ncycle.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dinosaurs got extinct 3 dissolutions before.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Vishnu Purana recorded 7000 years ago that\nwe are now at the middle of the first day of the 51st year of Brahma.&nbsp; &nbsp;Since\na Day of Brahma lasts for 12 million years, this shows that plant earth is now approx\n6 million years since the beginning of the current cycle of creation ( exhalation\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu Purana, reveals the\nprevious destruction events should have taken place as per the following\ntimelines: 18 million years ago, 42 million years ago and 66 million years ago.\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6dE4HjvhYK8/VaHlpjzRZCI/AAAAAAAA7UA/H2d1Piok5tg/s1600/did-an-asteroid-doomt-the-dinosaurs_64137_990x742.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
