, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">66 million years is the\ndate of extinction of the dinosaurs as per modern scientists. All these western\nmorons just copied from our ancient Vedas .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c- <i>&nbsp;a fire from the mouth\nof the underground serpent will burn the lower worlds, then the surface of the\nearth, and will set the atmosphere ablaze. This mass of fire will burn with a\ngreat noise. Surrounded by these circles of fire, all animate and inanimate\nobjects will be destroyed.\u201d. The stars will come adrift from the sky and the\ngiant sun will set the entire earth on fire; the universe will become an\nimmense furnace. All living things, all plant life, will be blotted out.</i>'- Mahabharata\n4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vishnu Purana tells\nus that at the end of a 'Day of Brahma' the physical universe is destroyed and\nis dissolved into the waters of the Primordial Ocean .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient temples have\nthe image of Vishnu avatar ( Krishna ) as a young baby floating on a leaf down\nthe river, sucking on the big toe .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0rHJI1ho3-o/VaDXJ6zkatI/AAAAAAAA7Ns/2o3oIv8JCQc/s1600/untitled8YH.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have a big bang which created the\ncosmos, you need to have a black hole singularity too.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is commonsense\nwhich Albert Einstein and party ignored despite being very proficient with\nIndian Vedas.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bindu of the Sri yantra represents singularity. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zZQXKOI32pM/VaDXXgQLEKI/AAAAAAAA7N8/qtKEOgSRQXg/s1600/SriYantra2-300x300.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zZQXKOI32pM/VaDXXgQLEKI/AAAAAAAA7N8/qtKEOgSRQXg/s1600/SriYantra2-300x300.png\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cosmos expands and\ncontracts at regular cycles as explained by Sri Krishna in the Bhagawat Gita. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WVn-60yxaUE/VaDXy17sYKI/AAAAAAAA7OM/CZRWueVg4Pc/s1600/imafges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WVn-60yxaUE/VaDXy17sYKI/AAAAAAAA7OM/CZRWueVg4Pc/s400/imafges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the Vedas the\nsole witness to the last cosmic deluge is Maharishi Markandeya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was stated by the\nLord in the Vedas: \u201cOh, Human! This village of yours is balanced on the banyan\nleaf and your lifespan is just a like a drop of water running down that leaf,\nwhich may fall any minute.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suddenly, amongst all\nthe confusion, Markandeya noticed a banyan leaf floating on the ocean, tossed\nby the waves. On this unlikely raft lay a beautiful and adorable child,\nsuckling his right toe, unperturbed by the calamity that had befallen the\nworld. It was Krishna as Vishnu, the newborn cosmic child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The infant's heavenly\nsmile negated the brutality of the pralaya (cosmic deluge). &nbsp; His compassionate\nglance reassured Markandeya that life would go on, convincing him that the\nworld never ends, but only changes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Markandeya went\nclose to this baby, he was sucked in with the air, when the baby took a breath.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inside, he saw hundreds\nof thousand of universes and all that had been consumed by the deluge - the\nskies, the seas, the earth, gods, demons, humans, animals and plants. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So much so, that he\neven had a glimpse of his own Ashram on the banks of the Subhadra River. He saw\nhimself sitting in meditation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Markandeya thus realized that the child was none\nother than the cosmic god who had withdrawn the world into himself. &nbsp;In that vast sea he again saw the banyan tree\ngrowing on the tiny island and the infant boy lying within the leaf.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/E8Uxq1ay-Ok/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/E8Uxq1ay-Ok?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child\n( Vishnu ) glanced at him from the corner of His eyes with a smile imbued with\nthe nectar of love, and Markandeya took Him into his heart through his eyes.\nGreatly agitated, the sage ran to embrace the transcendental Personality of\nGodhead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that moment the\nSupreme Personality of Godhead, who is the original master of all mysticism and\nwho is hidden within everyone's heart, became invisible to the sage, just as\nthe achievements of an incompetent person can suddenly vanish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Lord\ndisappeared, O brahmana, the banyan tree, the great water and the dissolution\nof the universe all vanished as well, and in an instant Markandeya found\nhimself back in his own hermitage, just as before. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here Lord Vishnu &nbsp;turned himself into a child ( read as DNA from\ncosmos ) as small as that could fit on a tiny leaf of a banyan tree, floating in\nthe Aakasha , until he himself decides to recreate everything back out from\nhimself. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU WILL REALISE THIS\n\"DNA FROM COSMOS\" CONCEPT IS VERY DIFEFRENT FROM THE LIFTED NOAH'S\nARC , \"MALE AND FEMALE ANIMAL\" CONCEPT IN THE BIBLE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The black hole or\nsingularity ( gravitational ) , the point at which the space time curvature\nbecomes infinite , is represented by Bindu on the Sri Yantra --the divine\ngeometric representation of this cyclic big-crunch and the big- bang..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Singularity\nexisted before the big-bang.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3x-NYpXpF8g/VaDXhgvhV9I/AAAAAAAA7OE/fShyewxwi_o/s1600/AS2D.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"458\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3x-NYpXpF8g/VaDXhgvhV9I/AAAAAAAA7OE/fShyewxwi_o/s640/AS2D.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">aha\u1e3f sarvasya prabhavo<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">matta\u1e25 sarva\u1e3f\npravartate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am the origin of\neverything<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything comes from\nme<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varahamihira the great\nAstrologer and astronomer from wrote 4600 years ago,&nbsp; in the opening of his Samhita, \u201c It has been\nsaid in Vedas that the first primeval thing was darkness, which is not\nidentical with the black colour, but a kind of non-existence like the state of\na sleeping person\" &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The big bang is\nmerely a prelude to the big crunch, and the universe is caught in an infinite\ncycle of expansion and contraction . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a\nmatter of principle, everything in the universe tends to get restored to its\noriginal source.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the &nbsp;Laws of Manu inform us that that the Yuga\nCycle is of 12,000 years duration, and is comprised of four Yugas or World Ages\n\u2013 Krita or Satya, Treta, Dwapara and Kali. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As humanity moves from the Krita Yuga to the\nKali Yuga, the level of virtue and human capabilities, both physical and\nmental, &nbsp;gradually decrease, and reaches\nits nadir in the Kali Yuga, the dark age .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">24000 multiplied by 360\ngives a value of &nbsp;4,320,000 years to\nfollow the golden spiral of time.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AHch2cWZSso/VaPWAru7fGI/AAAAAAAA7VM/Qu_fwu94_gU/s1600/ur3l-2.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AHch2cWZSso/VaPWAru7fGI/AAAAAAAA7VM/Qu_fwu94_gU/s640/ur3l-2.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cosmic mechanism is in reality is a GOLDEN\nspiral, never a stagnant circle<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PrPPcjEEXIs/VaDX-3qpU4I/AAAAAAAA7OU/aEqNjksSeKs/s1600/newsletter.pyhp_html_4e3hehbd278.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"375\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PrPPcjEEXIs/VaDX-3qpU4I/AAAAAAAA7OU/aEqNjksSeKs/s400/newsletter.pyhp_html_4e3hehbd278.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\"><b>SO WHAT IS\nTHIS 1.618 GOLDEN M</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: blue;\">EAN SPIRAL ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Outzz7wvfNE/VaPVzpLyn4I/AAAAAAAA7VE/Z-xs3V_iCFE/s1600/hqdefaT8ult.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Outzz7wvfNE/VaPVzpLyn4I/AAAAAAAA7VE/Z-xs3V_iCFE/s640/hqdefaT8ult.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cycle of four yugas\ntakes 25765 years ( instead of 4,320,000 ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Precession of the earth\nis approx. 50.26 seconds every year.. .( 1 degree is 60 minutes and 1 minute is\n60 seconds )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qlVgEoZDjok/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qlVgEoZDjok?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Puranas, the\nstalk of the lotus flower emerges from the navel of Lord Vishnu .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lD_x0OfrzMs/VaDYG0Z3b5I/AAAAAAAA7Oc/TWlRSPkvb4I/s1600/anantrrha_sayana8m1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lD_x0OfrzMs/VaDYG0Z3b5I/AAAAAAAA7Oc/TWlRSPkvb4I/s1600/anantrrha_sayana8m1.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is just\nNOT a simple flower \u2013but an amazing allegory--&nbsp;\nthe lotus \u201cseed-pod\u201d, which is symbolically equivalent to the golden\nMount Meru, the axis-mundi of the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Qutab Minar is\nrepresentative of the Meru.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mount Meru\nis the abode of the gods and on top of Meru are present the palaces of Brahma\nand the protectors of the eight directions.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yugas during the approach to Vishnunabhi are 'ascending' yugas;\nthose during the retreat from Brahma sits on a lotus which stems out of\nVishnu\u2019s nabhi or navel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The samhita of Manu\ntakes us from a pinnacle of light to the ultimate end-point of the process\u2014the\ndarkness of Kali Yuga.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 24 petals of\nthe ancient Hindu monument Qutab Minar &nbsp;is representative of the 24,000-year period of\nthe Vedic Yuga cycle.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-B0WMe2k2MGM/VaDYOOsDVbI/AAAAAAAA7Ok/b074goW9NdU/s1600/delhgggi6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">24 petal rashi chakra depicts the zodiac .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kHTaPiNTTcw/VaDYvQrKm9I/AAAAAAAA7PE/tzBYgYkJ7qE/s1600/untikutubnrr4%2B4.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"297\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kHTaPiNTTcw/VaDYvQrKm9I/AAAAAAAA7PE/tzBYgYkJ7qE/s320/untikutubnrr4%2B4.JPG\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a belt\nof the heavens limited by&nbsp; lines about 8\ndegrees on either side of the ecliptic or the path of&nbsp; the Sun.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--2myQBGoBts/VaDYVifOnLI/AAAAAAAA7Os/S557CTgMoKQ/s1600/rashi-cHuGFhakra.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--2myQBGoBts/VaDYVifOnLI/AAAAAAAA7Os/S557CTgMoKQ/s400/rashi-cHuGFhakra.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism we have 12 signs (\u2018Rashis\u2019), each 30\u00b0, of the zodiac&nbsp; and 27 constellations,&nbsp; each of 13\u00b0.20\u2019 (thirteen degrees and\ntwenty&nbsp; minutes).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sun itself orbits\naround the galactic center at a radius of about 8,500 parsecs and takes over\n200 million years to make one full orbit.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This the adjustment Varaha boar ( Vishnu ) made as the Milankovitch\nCycle of 25,765 years that is related to the precession of earth's axis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/vishnu-avatar-varaha-boar-fixing-planet.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SWKA1ITtdXc/VaG-opaJ7iI/AAAAAAAA7R8/5Rx91Ye1Ct0/s1600/vishwnu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SWKA1ITtdXc/VaG-opaJ7iI/AAAAAAAA7R8/5Rx91Ye1Ct0/s640/vishwnu.jpg\" width=\"482\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu Samhita says :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">chatvaaryahu sahsrani\nvarshanaantu kritam yugam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tasya tavchhati sandhya\nsandhyanshrshch tathavidhah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">itreshu sasandhyeshu\nsasandhyaansheshu ch trishu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ekapayen vartante\nsahsrani shatani ch<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yadetat\nparisankhyaatmadadev chaturyugam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">aetad dwadash-sahstram\ndevaanaam yugmuchyate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">daivikanaam yuggnaantu\nsahastram prisankhyayaa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">braahmaikamahgyeyam\ntaatati raatriraiv ch<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<i style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: normal;\"><b>Four thousands of years, they say, is the Krita Yuga (Satya Yuga). Its morning twilight has just as many hundredes, and its period of evening dusk is of the same length (i.e., 400+4000+400=4800). In the other three ages, with their morning and evening twilights, the thousands and the hundreds decrease by one (i.e., 300+3000+300=3600; etc.). That fourfold cycle comprising of 12,000 years is called an Age of the Gods. The sum of a thousand divine ages constitutes one day of Brahma; and of the same length is its night.</b></i><br />\n<i style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: normal;\"><b><br /></b></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient seers of\nthe Vedic culture referred to the Galactic Center as Vishnunabhi, or the navel\nof Vishnu. &nbsp; Brahma (Ultimate Creator) sits on a lotus,the symbol of divine\nenergy and divine grace.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cqrQqkHBa6g/VaDYbhtVEII/AAAAAAAA7O0/WUFkhvV6tK8/s1600/Lord-Vishtnu-Laxmi-andded-Brahma.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cqrQqkHBa6g/VaDYbhtVEII/AAAAAAAA7O0/WUFkhvV6tK8/s400/Lord-Vishtnu-Laxmi-andded-Brahma.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lotus grows from the navel of Vishnu, who is the\nsleeping god, whose dream is the universe. . . . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Brahma opens his eyes (\nEXHALES )and a world comes into being. . . Brahma closes his eyes ( INHALES ) ,\nand a world goes out of being.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu is said to rest in the coils of\nAnanta, the great serpent of Infinity, while he waits for the universe to\nrecreate itself.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cant have a big\nbang out of nothing\u2014rather it is inhalation and exhalation.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How the cosmos is created is mentioned in the\nverses of Nasadiya Sukta. \"<i>He falls back upon the earliest and greatest of\nRevelations, those of the Sacred Books of India with a Cosmogony which no\nEuropean conception has ever surpassed.&nbsp;\nWhile the West was still thinking, perhaps, of 6,000 years old universe\n\u2013 India was already envisioning ages and eons and galaxies as numerous as the\nsands of the Ganges. The Universe so vast that modern astronomy slips into its\nfolds without a ripple.</i>\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In hoary antiquity Manu\nindicates&nbsp; a period of 24,000 years \u2014\nclearly a reference to precession \u2014 consists of a series of four yugas or ages,\neach shorter and spiritually darker than the last. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-epJ2GkT5mtw/VaDYnNtV7zI/AAAAAAAA7O8/V1eQ6xaWDUU/s1600/yugar-cyEEcle.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"344\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-epJ2GkT5mtw/VaDYnNtV7zI/AAAAAAAA7O8/V1eQ6xaWDUU/s640/yugar-cyEEcle.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu is NOT about\npouring molten lead into the ears of the Dalits \u2013 as Kancha Ilaih squeaks on TV\nevery now and then\u2014 &nbsp;mindlessly repeating what was told in the past by BR\nAmbedkar and EVR Periyar, the stooges of Rothschild.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishi Manu was a\nvery noble soul unable to be a bigot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our 4 Hindu yugas are a\nspiral-- at the rate 4:3:2:1 .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Kali yuga the cosmic cow stands of one\nleg. Dharma walks on four feet in Krutha/Satya Yuga, on 3 feet in Tretha Yuga,\non two feet in Dwapara Yuga and one foot in Kaliyuga- this is an allegory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 25765 years is\ndivided into 4 yugas in a ratio of 4:3:2:1. ( satya/ treta/ dwapara/ kali ) . The\nsun has this&nbsp; motion by which it revolves\nround a grand center called Vishnunabhi, which is the seat of the creative\npower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yugas during the\napproach to Vishnunabhi are 'ascending' yugas; those during the retreat from\nVishnunabhi 'descending' yugas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Cosmic mechanism is in\nreality is a spiral, never a stagnant circle.&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cycle of four yugas takes 25765&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">years</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first point of\nPisces was the place where the equinoxial cuts the ecliptic&nbsp; till 21st Dec 2012.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 2012 AD it is aquarius ( indian kumbam\n)-- a new age, new sunrise at spring equinox -- precession of the equinoxes and\nmarkes the end of Kali yuga. &nbsp;&nbsp;At the end\nof&nbsp; Kali Yuga the Kalki avatar kicks\nin&nbsp; ( 21st Dec 2012 ) --with a cusp of 30\nyears&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first point of\nPisces is the place where the equinoxial cuts the ecliptic.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 0n 2286 BC the zodiac of taurius ( indian\nrishabham / aldebaran )) is over-- it existed only from 4435 BC to 2286 BC --\nthe age from 2286 BC is aries, ( indian medam / hamal )) the ram till 137 BC\n.&nbsp;&nbsp; From 137 BC to 2012 AD it is the age\nof pisces( indian eenam ) . From 2012 AD it is aquarius ( indian kumbam )-- a\nnew age, new sunrise at spring equinox -- precession of the equinoxes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">360 degrees = 360*60\nminutes = 360*60*60 seconds of arc = 1296000 seconds of arc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1296000 seconds of\narc/50.26 seconds of arc/year = 25785.91 years. It takes 25785.91 years for 1\nfull circle \u2013 \u2018 for Revati to \u2018return\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till 5000 BC when the\nRig Veda was written down in Sanskrit , the Vedas were handed down orally by Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and photographic memories.. &nbsp;7000 year ago, the &nbsp;Maharishis felt that the DNA would be\ndegraded and pineal glands atrophied.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You've chosen me-- I've\nheard it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This love is new to me,\nso is this longing <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shall I roam on the\nridges of this wind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shall I merge the sky\nand earth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She spoke to me in such\na way <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is OM?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole world has\nlifted from OM. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jews call it SHALOM\n, the Christian call it AMEN, the muslims call it 786 ( printed on every Koran\n) which is OM symbol shown in the mirror and read off from right to left, the Sikhs\ncall it OMKAR etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; religions Christianity, Judaism and Islam note this-<br />\n<br />\nIn Genesis 24:22, Abraham secures Rebekah (daughter of Bethuel, the son that Milkah bore to Nahor.) as a wife for his son Isaac \u2013 Rebekah was a Hindu and Abraham gave her a nose ring (SHANF ) as a wedding present.<br />\n<br />\nA nose ring is NOT a fashion statement in Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/brahma-and-sarawati-abraham-and-sara.html<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma Parvati, Saraswati and Lakshmi are always depicted with Mukkuthi ( nose stud )<br />\n<br />\nIn Hinduism a girl\u2019s nose is pierced (at PHANA MARMA where the path of pingala nadi goes up on the way to the Ajna Chakra ).once she is \u201cof marriageable age\u201d and marks her as ready for a husband -- after her FIRST MENSES.<br />\n<br />\nCertain severe gynecological complaints could be cured by cauterizing the appropriate parts of the nose.<br />\n<br />\nHot temper in a girl and menses problems are an indicator that nose needs piercing in a teenaged girl , and was always done by a Ayurveda doctor who knew the marma.<br />\n<br />\nIn South India they pierce the right nostril ( correct MARMA spot to eliminate nagging ) , while in North India they wrongly pierce the left nostril .<br />\n<br />\nThis practice of DEVADASIS piercing the opposite left side was caused by the white invader.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br />\n<br />\nAlmost like Kashmiri separatists wearing wrist watch on the right hand.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/yanks-and-pommies-quite-contrary-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nPingala Nadi is connected to the right nostril ( for right handers )<br />\n<br />\nPingala nadi is associated with masculine energy- feeling hot, quick temper and easily angered, itching body, dry skin and throat, excessive appetite, excessive sexual energy..<br />\n<br />\nNose piercing makes the female\u2019s menstrual problems lesser. You know how much old women suffer at the PMS stage.<br />\n<br />\nThe nasal passages of women swell, and occasionally bleed, during menstruation.<br />\n<br />\nNose piercing makes the woman more fertile as per 6000 year old Ayurveda and reduces water retention( Phana Marma ).<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/chembu-kizhangu-colocasia-and-pms.html<br />\n<br />\nI DARE ANY HYPNOTIST TO MESMERISE A WOMAN WHO WEARS A DIAMOND MUKKUTHI ( NOSE RING )<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/12/awakening-and-raising-kundalini-after.html<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_320b+seedFCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_320b+seedFCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_320b+seedFCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_320b+seedFCD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Jkh-nX68r6E/VaoSJMHnYHI/AAAAAAAA7YQ/bq5vDzfA7K0/s1600/shiva-panrvati.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Jkh-nX68r6E/VaoSJMHnYHI/AAAAAAAA7YQ/bq5vDzfA7K0/s640/shiva-panrvati.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE TALK ABOUT THE\nBREATH OF BRAHMA WHICH SNUFFS OUT BILLIONS OF GALAXIES WITH ONE INHALATION AND\nRE-CREATES THEM IN AN EXHALATION .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT HEY, THE ZIONIST WHITE\nINVADER TRIVIALISED HINDU GODS BRAHMA, VISHNU AND SHIVA\u2014 WHO ARE AMAZING COSMIC\nALLEGORIES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHECK OUT WIKIPEDIA \u2013\nHOW MAHARISHI BHRIGU CURSED BRAHMA !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhrigu\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bhrigu</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">######################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Many great sages gathered at the bank of\nriver Sarasvati to participate in Maha yagya organized at that time. Maharishi\nBhrigu was also present there. All the great saints and sages could not decide\nthat out of the Trinity Lord Vishnu, Brahma and Shiv who is pre-eminent and to\nwhom should they offer Pradhanta (Master) of that yagya. With the consent of\nall the great saints present there, it was decided that Maharishi Bhrigu will\ntest and decide who was pre-eminent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upon being entrusted\nwith the task Maharishi Bhrigu decided to test Lord Brahma first. He went on to\nsee Lord Brahma in Brahmaloka. On reaching Brahmalok Maharishi displayed utter\ndisrespect to Lord Brahma on purpose. Lord Brahma got angry and wanted to punish\nMaharishi but Maha Saraswati, wife of Lord Brahma saved Maharishi from his\nanger. Angry with disrespect, Maharishi Bhrigu cursed Lord Brahma that no one\nwill worship Brahma in Kaliyuga. To this day, there are very few temples\ndevoted to Lord Brahma (the notable exception being the Brahma Temple at\nPushkar).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishi Bhrigu then\ndecided to visit Lord Shiva at Kailash Parvata. On reaching Kailash Parvat,\nNandi stopped him from going inside because at that time, Shiva and Parvathi\nwere sporting fun ( <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DOING WANTON JIGI JIGI </b>) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhrigu curses Lord\nShiva to be only worshipped in Linga form. (We however have a statue form of\nlord Shiva in Kashi (Maha Mrityunjaya Temple) said to be over 400 years old.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then in order to test\nLord Vishnu, Maharishi reached Vaikunth Dhama. He entered the Dhama without\nLord Vishnu's permission and saw that the Lord was resting at that time.\nMaharishi asked him to wake up, but Lord was in deep sleep. On seeing no\nreaction from Lord, Maharishi hit Lord Vishnu on his chest (that strike by\nMaharishi Bhrigu left a foot print on Lord's chest and that foot print is known\nas \"Shri Vatsa\").<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu got up\nafter the strike and realized what had happened. On realizing that Maharishi\nhad hit him with his foot, Lord asked him, \u201cMaharishi, are you hurt in your\nfoot? My chest is strong but your foot is not so strong\". Seeing the\ndecorum of Lord Vishnu, Bhrigu was pleased and declared him superior amongst\nthe Trideva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Hindu\ntheology, goddess of prosperity and wife of Lord Vishnu, Maha Laxmi also\nwitnessed the whole incident, as she was also present in the Dhama at that\ntime. &nbsp;She could not tolerate disrespect\ndisplayed by Maharishi Bhrigu towards Lord Vishnu and cursed him that\nhenceforth she would never visit Brahmins and they will all live in absence of\nwealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On hearing this curse\nfrom Maha Laxmi, Maharishi told her about the true nature of his visit. Maha\nLaxmi then told Maharishi, that her curse would still haunt Brahmins but\nwhenever any Brahmin would worship Lord Vishnu, he would be liberated from the\ncurse.[13][14]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this incident\nMaharishi Bhrigu decided to write his famous book of astrology, the Bhrigu\nSamhita, to help Brahmins earn their living.( <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THANK GOD FOR TENDER MERCIES !</b>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">##################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEEE HEEEEEEEEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ABOVE STORY IS RECREATED IN MOST LITERARY FESTS FUNDED BY TROJAN HORSE NGOs.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
