Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nApril 1, 2015 at 8:04 AM<br />\nhi uk,<br />\n<br />\nthe roof of pathos ( emotions ) cannot deliver on its own in a truth exhuming blog site.<br />\n<br />\nit has to be laid on a foundation of ethos ( trust )<br />\n<br />\nsupported by walls made of logos ( consistency )<br />\n<br />\nto hold the INTEREST of a vast multinational audience ( whom you bollock hour after hour ) you need pathos .<br />\n<br />\nany idiot can hold the ATTENTION -- only a chosen few can hold the interest .<br />\n<br />\nand the authors who were sponsored by big brother -- they have all fallen by the wayside in this internet age.<br />\n<br />\nhave you seen the pathetic JOKERS on main stream media ?<br />\n<br />\nthey are like the flea ridden cats at port royale , discussing how the treasure should be divided and which pirate should get what. the pirates do NOT even know that these mangy cats exist.<br />\n<br />\nlike body/ mind and soul -- every piece of prose must have ethos/ pathos / logos.<br />\n<br />\nwithout pathos poetry cannot exist.<br />\n<br />\ncheck out the worlds greatest poets sponsored by big brother -- do you see any pathos ?<br />\n<br />\na perceptive soul verily said - \"the heart has reasons that the mind knows not of.\" -- statistics may fall, arguments may fall short -- pathos never fails.<br />\n<br />\nonly IDIOTS like winston churchill think pathos is rhetoric<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kNKqeEE9zFY/VYAH3Aj7cTI/AAAAAAAA638/Z75eHLwYxKg/s1600/ethos-p0pathos-logos.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kNKqeEE9zFY/VYAH3Aj7cTI/AAAAAAAA638/Z75eHLwYxKg/s400/ethos-p0pathos-logos.jpg\" width=\"237\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0bi1PvXCbr8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0bi1PvXCbr8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Friends, Romans,\ncountrymen, lend me your ears;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I come to bury Caesar,\nnot to praise him.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The evil that men do\nlives after them;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The good is oft\ninterred with their bones;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">So let it be with\nCaesar. The noble Brutus<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hath told you Caesar\nwas ambitious:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">If it were so, it was a\ngrievous fault,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And grievously hath\nCaesar answer'd it.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Here, under leave of\nBrutus and the rest--<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">For Brutus is an\nhonourable man;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">So are they all, all\nhonourable men--<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Come I to speak in\nCaesar's funeral.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He was my friend,\nfaithful and just to me:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">But Brutus says he was\nambitious;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And Brutus is an\nhonourable man.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He hath brought many\ncaptives home to Rome<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Whose ransoms did the\ngeneral coffers fill:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Did this in Caesar seem\nambitious?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When that the poor have\ncried, Caesar hath wept:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Ambition should be made\nof sterner stuff:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yet Brutus says he was\nambitious;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And Brutus is an\nhonourable man.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You all did see that on\nthe Lupercal<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I thrice presented him\na kingly crown,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Which he did thrice\nrefuse: was this ambition?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Yet Brutus says he was\nambitious;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And, sure, he is an\nhonourable man.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I speak not to disprove\nwhat Brutus spoke,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">But here I am to speak\nwhat I do know.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">You all did love him\nonce, not without cause:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">What cause withholds\nyou then, to mourn for him?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">O judgment! thou art\nfled to brutish beasts,<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And men have lost their\nreason. Bear with me;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">My heart is in the\ncoffin there with Caesar,</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">And I must pause till\nit come back to me.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his Rhetorica\nAristotle identifies the three canonical modes of artistic proof:&nbsp; ethos, pathos and logos on grounds that, in\norder to persuade, one must exude good character, move the audience by\nappealing to emotions, and, of course, advance good reasons.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle lifted his\nideas from the DIALECTICS, METAPHYSICS , EPISTEMOLOGY, EMPIRICISM of the Indian Vedas and Upanishads\npenned down 7000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/vedas-and-upanishads-written-in-5000-bc.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/vedas-and-upanishads-written-in-5000-bc.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/on-trail-of-truth-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/on-trail-of-truth-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-x022P3O6q6U/VYDs00Mz4TI/AAAAAAAA64c/uSCv-QUAxWI/s1600/ifmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-x022P3O6q6U/VYDs00Mz4TI/AAAAAAAA64c/uSCv-QUAxWI/s1600/ifmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE ROOF OF PATHOS CANNOT BE LAID WITHOUT THE FOUNDATION OF ETHOS AND THE WALLS OF LOGOS.. &nbsp; NO BOOK OR WEBSITE TILL DATE , HAS THE PERCEPTION TO MENTION THIS</b></span>.</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a4pqoVMXIY8/VYDtE-fc9uI/AAAAAAAA64k/HpSfxBJPkWs/s1600/imngcages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"317\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a4pqoVMXIY8/VYDtE-fc9uI/AAAAAAAA64k/HpSfxBJPkWs/s400/imngcages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A CHANGE MANAGER must know the art of\npersuasion. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Half wits &nbsp;cannot be change managers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been a change manager\nat sea. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I KEPT PATHOS OUT OF\nTHE EQUATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dR_-v584iiE/VY-myYfgsVI/AAAAAAAA680/wElPtv6eMuY/s1600/downlR56oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"259\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dR_-v584iiE/VY-myYfgsVI/AAAAAAAA680/wElPtv6eMuY/s640/downlR56oad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AT SEA , AS A SHIPS\nCAPTAIN FOR 3 DECADES, MY ETHOS WAS SO HUGE (LITERALLY- CAPTAINs SHIT DOES NOT\nSMELL ) THAT MANY OF MY SHORE BOSSES WHO GAVE ME A BAD SERVICE REPORT GOT SACKED.\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">S A LIFE TIME TO\nBUILD ETHOS \u2013 &nbsp;ALL IT TAKES IS ONE CARELESS\nSECOND TO BRING THE ETHOS EDIFICE CRUMBLING DOWN. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">YOU CANT HANG ON LIKE A\nLIMPET FOR TWO FULL YEARS LIKE TENDULKAR.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I could convince the audience\nthat the sun rises in the west at the beginning of my speech and that the sun rises\nin the east at the end -&nbsp; and have the audience\nlap it all up.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva as Dakshinamurthy\nis regarded as the first guru. &nbsp;&nbsp;Dakshinamurthy\n, the first Guru who had NO Guru . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He attuned and imparted\nvast knowledge to the 4 Kumaras via silence while in the Turiya state. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is beyond the wildest\ncomprehension of the shallow minded modern white man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">Ethos</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> involves the speaker\u2019s/\nwriter\u2019s authority on the subject, &nbsp;sterling\ncharacter , credibility , reputation , &nbsp;inherent\nethics, &nbsp;trust he generates, &nbsp;integrity , compassion, &nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">fairness</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">, &nbsp;accountability, superior\nstyle , tone, &nbsp;ethics, &nbsp;behavior , personal\nwarmth , clarity of mind , knowledge , experience , family history, cod</span></span></b></span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">e</span></span></b><b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">at of our&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">freedom</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">struggle</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">.</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People must get the feeling\nthat you are considerate and worth listening to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We tend to believe\npeople whom we respect &nbsp;and like.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ethos (Greek for\n'character') refers to the trustworthiness or credibility of the writer or\nspeaker.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nspeakers &nbsp;reputation must exist &nbsp;independently from his message. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People are willing to listen\nwhat Maradona has to say on the subject of soccer- he needs NO introduction or\nproduction of bonafides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The impact of ethos is\noften called the argument's 'ethical appeal' or the 'appeal from credibility.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ethos is the Greek word\nfor \u201ccharacter.\u201d The word \u201cethic\u201d is derived from ethos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Greeks established\na sense of ethos by a family's reputation in the community.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle says, if\npeople are gonna &nbsp;judge your spoken\nand/or written ideas by virtue of the appearance of good sense, you'd best polish\nthat quality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ethos\ncan be developed by choosing language that is appropriate for the audience and\ntopic .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nlayman deos NOT appreciate bombastic language .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nspeaker must &nbsp;sound fair or unbiased, &nbsp;when introducing his own expertise or pedigree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or&nbsp; he will sound like an asshole , nay prick of\nthe first order.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nthe second presidential debate of 2008, Senator John PRICK McCain emphasized his own\ngood</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;judgment in this stupid way:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"And\nI am convinced that my record, going back to my opposition from sending the\nMarines&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>to Lebanon, to supporting our efforts in Kosovo and Bosnia and the\nfirst Gulf War, and my&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>judgment, I think, is something that ... I'm willing to\nstand on.\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only\nCHOOTS dole out self-testimonials this way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John\nbaby did so because he believed what Aristotle wrote 2300 years ago &nbsp;\u201c If you want people&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">to believe you, you must\nfirst show that you believe yourself\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some\nbullshit funda Aristotle wrote on his own-&nbsp;\nmost he lifted from ancient Indian scriptures.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1in; text-align: left; text-indent: -1in;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0Yn6_LvPA7M/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0Yn6_LvPA7M?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good\nspeakers use powerful gestures, and eye contact and so on to bath themselves in\nethos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.0in; text-indent: -1.0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: 1.5in; text-align: left; text-indent: -1.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Abov</b></span></span><b style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large;\">e</b><b style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%; text-indent: -1.5in;\">: The\npeabrained &nbsp;TV evangelists who jump\naround like orangutans look stupid.</b></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often, a celebrity\nendorses a product to lend it more credibility\u2014 like how Chitpavan&nbsp; Madhuri Dixit jumped around like&nbsp; sack of potatoes while lying MAGGI&nbsp; NOODLES IS HEALTHY FOOD<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LLrIkW1SYtw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/LLrIkW1SYtw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ethos is a difficult\nthing to acquire; sometimes it may take decades to build a strong, credible\nreputation .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Jew Rothschild who ruled\nIndia gave instant cooked up ethos to Gandhi using his monopolized media.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have an atheist like\nAgnivesh who gave himself the title of Swami and wears saffron robes of our\nancient gurus to grab ethos.&nbsp; Mind you,\nthis man created and named Nobel prize winner Kailash Satyarthi. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both worked for a foreign\nfunded NGO- Mukti Pratishthan Trust \u2013 two decades ago.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pImVuU1KnzU/VZD9Cg4o0jI/AAAAAAAA69o/zc64rFhT0ds/s1600/f845c9bf-558f-4b24-8721d-c531bf2b7ea2MediumRes.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"263\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pImVuU1KnzU/VZD9Cg4o0jI/AAAAAAAA69o/zc64rFhT0ds/s400/f845c9bf-558f-4b24-8721d-c531bf2b7ea2MediumRes.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a court room you can\nsee that LOGOS rules.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logos means persuading\nby the use of reasoning and was Aristotle\u2019s favorite.&nbsp; Aristotle believed that logos should be the\nmost important of the three persuasive appeals. As a philosopher and a master\nof logical reasoning, he believed that logos should be the only required\npersuasive appeal. That is, if you demonstrated logos, you should not need\neither ethos or pathos. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However most\npeople who won\u2019t change their minds based on logical argument are willing to do\nso when their emotions are involved, which is why so many political\nadvertisements use them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving rock hard reasons\nis the heart of argumentation, and cannot be emphasized enough.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The strategy behind\nlogos is not to just to spit out a fact or number and have that be your argument,\nbut rather to use factual or agreed upon information to provide a foundation\nfor your argument. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logos gives the\naudience a tangible comparison and is especially useful because it\u2019s extremely\ndifficult to argue with sound logic.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logos (Greek for\n'word') refers to the internal consistency of the message--the clarity of the\nclaim, the logic of its reasons, and the effectiveness of its supporting\nevidence.&nbsp; The impact of logos on an\naudience is sometimes called the argument's logical appeal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logos appeals to the\naudience's sense of logic.&nbsp; Logos deals\nwith reason , proof, supporting evidence, &nbsp;consistency, facts, figures, case studies, credible\narguments, strategy, history ,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">xampl</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">s, statistics , analogies etc.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There appeals to cause and consequences.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having a logos appeal\nalso enhances ethos because information makes the speaker look knowledgeable\nand prepared to his or her audience. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our\nBENAMI media gives us &nbsp;inaccurate,\nfalsified, or miscontextualized data , to enact a pathos effect. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logos focuses first on\nthe argument, using cool logic and rational explanation, as well as\ndemonstrable evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you argue without\nevidence, a scientist would dismiss your argument as metaphysical (literally,\noutside the physical world) and call you a wannable prophet<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reason uses rational\npoints that call on accepted truths and proven theories. &nbsp;Where evidence does not exist, reason may\nstill prevail. &nbsp;A common tool in\nreasoning is to link two items together, for example by cause and effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reasoning often uses\nsyllogisms, that include a major premise, a minor premise and a conclusion\nbased on the combination of the two premises. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good writing and speaking\nskills are among the talents modern employers are looking for.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logos orients us three\nways.&nbsp; &nbsp;It leads us towards practical problem solving.\nIt prompts decision and action. And, it helps us plan for the future with\nvision and strategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle said \u201cthe\nmost important thing by far is to have a command of metaphor\u201d. &nbsp;He added: \u201cFor this is the only one that\ncannot be learned from anyone else, and is a sign of natural genius, as to be\ngood at metaphor is to perceive resemblances. It gives clearness charm and\ndistinction to style.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metaphors say things in\nterms of something else. &nbsp;They create\nassociations and links between things.. The best metaphors awaken the senses by\nevoking images and emotions in the audience. They define things in fresh new\nways. &nbsp;They create a mini-story in a\nsentence. They are remembered long after facts are forgotten. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are sticky. &nbsp;Like long after &nbsp;the music is forgotten the melody lingers. &nbsp;Metaphor has transformational power by\ncreating a bridge between previously unconnected things.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle understood:\n\u201cMetaphor is judged not only by its fit to the thing signified, but also by its\nsound or by the appeal it makes to the eye or some other sense.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-82eGWUs3Aqc/VZE5kbprpXI/AAAAAAAA6-A/KLLhkU0SNZw/s1600/metap987hor1.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"518\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-82eGWUs3Aqc/VZE5kbprpXI/AAAAAAAA6-A/KLLhkU0SNZw/s640/metap987hor1.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metaphors work partly\nbecause they offer simplifications of the complex world. A metaphor creates an\nappealing image or picture of an often far more complicated reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metaphor heightens\ndrama and evokes imagery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UeNWpF8ZJpI/VZE5RCFMRWI/AAAAAAAA694/A05dgyds-d0/s1600/dowbnload%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UeNWpF8ZJpI/VZE5RCFMRWI/AAAAAAAA694/A05dgyds-d0/s640/dowbnload%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle\u2019s insight\nthat: \u201cA fool tells me his reasons. The wise man persuades me with my own\u201d..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Different people are persuaded by different types of appeals. Some people are\ninfluenced most by values, stories and metaphors; others just want you to be\nfactual, brief and to the point.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some revel in the details and want to know how\nyour proposal is going to work; and still others feel empowered by being part\nof a social group sharing the experience of working and being together.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Different things impact on different people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people are\n\u2018thinkers\u2019 while others are \u2018feelers\u2019. Thinkers are more persuaded by rational\narguments based on logic and analysis. Feelers are more persuaded by\nvalues-based arguments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Skilled communicators\ncan reach out to all personality types. &nbsp;Reason\ncan be built into an argument through storytelling. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instant\nstory telling and deriving morals is a priceless logos method - very few people\ncan do this. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">y&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">loved</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;m</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 24px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;for it..</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/word-for-every-occasion-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/word-for-every-occasion-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the post below you\ncan substitute caustic with SHIT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/caustic-humor-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/caustic-humor-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cRhetoric is the art of\nruling the minds of men.\u201d \u2013 Plato<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle opens the\nrhetoric maintaining that: \u201crhetoric is the counterpart of dialectic\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle defines\ndialectic as \u201ca logical method of debating issues of general interest, starting\nfrom widely accepted propositions (endoxa)\u201d (74) and to be able to hold up an\nargument while saying nothing self-contradictory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though based upon\nendoxa (a sophistic device), dialectic\u2019s true strength derives from its ability\nto view both sides of an argument \u2013 and then to use, in its way, endoxa to\ngenerate conclusions based on an audience\u2019s emotions.&nbsp; Dialectic tests old ideas while creating new\nones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rhetoric and dialectic\nboth begin with endoxa; however, rhetoric uses a different set of proofs than\ndoes dialectic.&nbsp; These proofs lie in\ncharacter (ethos) and emotions (pathos) \u2013 whilke dialectic can be seen as\nsocially constructed logic (logos).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rhetoric and dialectic\ncombined comprise Aristotle\u2019s tripartite rhetorical tream of ethos, pathos, and\nlogos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WH</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">E</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">R</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">E</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">E</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THOS AND LOGOS IS ZILCH , CROOKS DO H</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">E</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">GLIAN&nbsp;DIALECTIC.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WARNING :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOTHING WORKS UNLESS THE\n\u201cTIMING\u201d IS PERFECT !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maggi is NOT gonna sing\nthe praises of their instant noodles for a while.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7zt3JcsVyIs/VZFQ4UXWyXI/AAAAAAAA6-Q/3H-ivsXBjkg/s1600/downloafd%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO NOT OFFER ANYBODY A\nCHICKEN BIRIYANI AFTER HE HAS JUST FED HIS FACE WITH TWO MUTTON BIRIYANIS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Very few people know\nhow to us</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;time to their advantage.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
