text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3BtZGeRqxs4/VZOn4b-LjDI/AAAAAAAA6-s/vDE70-RJsh4/s1600/i39mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3BtZGeRqxs4/VZOn4b-LjDI/AAAAAAAA6-s/vDE70-RJsh4/s400/i39mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans are emotional\ncreatures as well as thinking ones. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The heart has hajaar\nreasons that the mind knows not of.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-r5G9i4vjGls/VZOpbM395aI/AAAAAAAA6_M/9QYLjivUM_M/s1600/imav1ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-r5G9i4vjGls/VZOpbM395aI/AAAAAAAA6_M/9QYLjivUM_M/s400/imav1ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes, when all the\nspeakers reputation fails, his arguments fall short, and all his words echo\nlike empty vessels , he must make the audience feel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tZLNC9Dt07I/VZOpAL0TkQI/AAAAAAAA6_E/6mmbRQ5RgXg/s1600/down23load%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tZLNC9Dt07I/VZOpAL0TkQI/AAAAAAAA6_E/6mmbRQ5RgXg/s400/down23load%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">Pathos </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">appeals to the audience's sense of emotions,\nvalues, imagination, beliefs, empathy, pity, pain etc ,</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos covers all sorts\nof emotions: jokes to make an audience laugh, scorn to make them mock a\nstupidity, anger at an injustice to enrage , sorrow to make them feel regret,\nenigmas/ paradoxes to arouse curiosity, and soothing words to relax readers or\nprovide comfort&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xztlO3W1gtY/VZOoQwRpi1I/AAAAAAAA6-8/OrHT2LedBeE/s1600/ima7Kges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xztlO3W1gtY/VZOoQwRpi1I/AAAAAAAA6-8/OrHT2LedBeE/s400/ima7Kges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos works best with\ntechniques like narration, description, juxtaposition, and artful repetition. &nbsp;( Brutus is a honorable man ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos can put hooks on\nto your nostrils and drag you to Chinatown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos can trigger &nbsp;powerful conclusions that wrap up an argument.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oHaNNg2twvs/VZOs0fXi1qI/AAAAAAAA6_o/NFC6YZTSIvo/s1600/image905s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oHaNNg2twvs/VZOs0fXi1qI/AAAAAAAA6_o/NFC6YZTSIvo/s400/image905s.jpg\" width=\"387\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos ensures that readers are interested and\ninvolved in the argument; it appeals to the human love of storytelling and\ndetail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The secret is not to\ntell the reader what to feel, but to meander your rhetoric in such a deliberate\nway as to conjure that emotion. &nbsp;Telling\nthe reader, \"You should be angry about so and so \u201d is never as effective\nas providing a detailed example that would make any feeling human upset.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WidXfMxjDNk/VZOsk2Hd1sI/AAAAAAAA6_g/_zck-jAh5uM/s1600/image48s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WidXfMxjDNk/VZOsk2Hd1sI/AAAAAAAA6_g/_zck-jAh5uM/s400/image48s.jpg\" width=\"249\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your pathos delivery\nfails with an intelligent audience god save you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HAMAARA DESH MEIN AAJ\nGANDHI &nbsp;NAHI &nbsp;HAI<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>HAMAARA DESH MEIN AAJ NEHRU\n&nbsp;NAHI &nbsp;HAI <o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AAJ KAL HAMAARA TABIYAT\nBHI<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">COUGH COUGH </span><span style=\"color: purple;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>KUCH KHARAAB HAI <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>COUGH COUGH</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-m4JW_i7xlRQ/VZOsS-0rp3I/AAAAAAAA6_Y/hLJjKXV1PdM/s1600/imG7ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-m4JW_i7xlRQ/VZOsS-0rp3I/AAAAAAAA6_Y/hLJjKXV1PdM/s400/imG7ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos must aim to infuse\nspirit . It must be used ethically, rather than painting falthu emotion over\nweak arguments too frail to stand up on the merits of their reason alone.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-R9-FkrAWfwQ/VZOvEuGcNeI/AAAAAAAA6_0/Y1ZL1498olc/s1600/ima49ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-R9-FkrAWfwQ/VZOvEuGcNeI/AAAAAAAA6_0/Y1ZL1498olc/s640/ima49ges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos must emanate\nfrom the depths of the soul, not from the five superficial senses. Pathos must\ngo way beyond commonplace pity or sympathy; it must transcend to humanity level- &nbsp;rather\nit must resonate .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3rjC4aG4rLw/VZOv3CQVulI/AAAAAAAA6_8/baQqBB0HjZY/s1600/i29mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3rjC4aG4rLw/VZOv3CQVulI/AAAAAAAA6_8/baQqBB0HjZY/s640/i29mages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Empathy is the faculty\nto resonate with the feelings of others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The master of Pathos\ncan cause his audience to leave the meeting with the resonance of what they have\nfelt and what they thought in reaction to that.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He can ignite minds elpronto&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">like</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;a&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">forest</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;fir</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">e--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XaDwN_CPwLM/VZO2HhoXWjI/AAAAAAAA7AU/JVRfoKcN29E/s1600/forest-hfires.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XaDwN_CPwLM/VZO2HhoXWjI/AAAAAAAA7AU/JVRfoKcN29E/s640/forest-hfires.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/when-crowd-tuns-into-mob-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/when-crowd-tuns-into-mob-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">- or he can germinate\na thought in a mind , the slow way he&nbsp;wants it to - where a speck of sand can become\na pearl over time.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wrRXesza7gs/VZO1hmC9AtI/AAAAAAAA7AM/tK4pmOL9Qdk/s1600/pearl-oyster-pherfection.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wrRXesza7gs/VZO1hmC9AtI/AAAAAAAA7AM/tK4pmOL9Qdk/s400/pearl-oyster-pherfection.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos can be misused. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Teresa generated\nmaximum pathos in recent times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wise ones have seen\nthrough her hollow pathos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZBKJEI-o1A0/VZO5UEvntjI/AAAAAAAA7Ag/8NbkDVxjgOI/s1600/saint-of-thre-gutters.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"434\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZBKJEI-o1A0/VZO5UEvntjI/AAAAAAAA7Ag/8NbkDVxjgOI/s640/saint-of-thre-gutters.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not all munificent acts\nhave pure intentions. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we help others\nwith ulterior motives, that is not an act of kindness at all but\nselfishness with malicious intent.&nbsp; .\nThere is a great difference between the noble intention to help and doing the\nact of benevolence with selfish motive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The intention in human\npathos is indeed immaculate - it is the genesis of moral consciousness. It is\nnot just a mere feeling of &nbsp;pity; &nbsp;it is a beautiful and profound sensation that\nsprings from an incomplete being whose completion is to soak in the joys and\nsorrows of other beings. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human pathos is\nauthentic and rationally felt by any human through a compassionate encounter\nwith other human without ulterior motive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shared sensation,, in\nhuman pathos is the very essence of our humanity; it reconciles our being with\nother beings toward a shared hope and vision . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-o0S5zNqIqmw/VZO8SxrDk3I/AAAAAAAA7As/kYy9_Ea7t_c/s1600/imagv4es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-o0S5zNqIqmw/VZO8SxrDk3I/AAAAAAAA7As/kYy9_Ea7t_c/s400/imagv4es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pedophile give a small child a lollipop to\nsuck on before he forces/ cons the innocent child to suck on something else.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A saint\nwho gives shelter to a vulnerable man with ulterior motive is worse that this pedophile.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One does not have to be\nreligious, cultured, &nbsp;educated or a \"saint\" to be capable of human pathos or compassion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Svvq0pMaUHw/VZO85TK88PI/AAAAAAAA7A0/GoDUJ7xT50w/s1600/downl39oad%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Svvq0pMaUHw/VZO85TK88PI/AAAAAAAA7A0/GoDUJ7xT50w/s640/downl39oad%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotion, or\n\"pathos,\" is a rhetorical device that can be used in an argument to\ndraw the audience in and to help it connect with the argument.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Aristotle wrote , pathos\nworks in conjunction with logos (logic) and ethos (credibility) to help form a\nsolid argument.. &nbsp;Used correctly with proper\ntiming , pathos can make a bland argument come alive for the audience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos offers a way for\nthe audience to relate to the subject through commonly held emotions.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If pathos is used in a brained\nmanner , it will only serve to muddy the argumentative waters-&nbsp; like a certain demented orangutan on primetime\nTV.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And by experiencing\nthis emotion, the reader begins to develop his or her own emotional response:\nsympathy, horror, and anger. The student has helped the reader connect to his\nargument through the effective use of pathos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos must evoke an\nemotional response from a reader/ audience by appealing to empathy, fear,\nhumor, or some other human emotion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a writer employs a\nnarrative or anecdote, he or she is usually attempting to connect with the\nreader emotionally. Pathos humanizes the problem and draws on readers' empathy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Songs (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">v</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">n music ) and pictures produce emotional responses.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dQVvz8OlY5g/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQVvz8OlY5g?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An appeal to pathos must\ncause the audience to respond imagine emotionally and identify with the\nwriter's point of view--to feel what the writer feels. &nbsp;In this sense, pathos evokes a meaning\nimplicit in the verb 'to suffer'--to feel pain imaginatively.... through\nnarrative or story, which can turn the abstractions of logic into something\npalpable and present.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The values, beliefs, and understandings of the writer are\nimplicit in the story and conveyed imaginatively to the reader. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos forces the audience\nto decision or action. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO POINT IN WINKING AT\nA GIRL IN THE &nbsp;DARK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Masters of pathos know\nthat this is the strongest of all appeals\u2014harnessing the power of emotion to\nsway the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On my ship when I told\nmy crew to jump, they asked only \"how high\"- &nbsp; &nbsp;never \"why\", or \"what for\"- but that was\nethos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhile using pathos , even a dimwit knows that the audience loves\nto be flattered rather than be insulted. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">But if your LOGOS is super strong , you can insult the audience\n( tell them to fuck themselves ) and get more readership - &nbsp;such is the paradox of LOGOS.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nquestion to ask is -&nbsp; does &nbsp;the audience gain from being insulted and shat\non their collective&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">faces hour after hour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such is the power of \u201ctruth exhuming\u201d which\nthis blog site does.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-left: .5in; text-indent: -.5in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3QwXeZrCUd8/VZPHzSiUzjI/AAAAAAAA7Bk/vU1hkKK0eZk/s1600/im38jagges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3QwXeZrCUd8/VZPHzSiUzjI/AAAAAAAA7Bk/vU1hkKK0eZk/s400/im38jagges.jpg\" width=\"274\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally, appeals to\nour sense of identity and self interest exploit common biases; &nbsp;we naturally bend in the direction of what is\nadvantageous to us, what serves our interests or the interests of any group we\nbelieve ourselves a part of..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BR Ambedkar saw everything\nthrough the DALIT prism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/cnn-ibn-poll-greatest-indian-since.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/cnn-ibn-poll-greatest-indian-since.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pvZTY7mKUAE/VZPFXPBlBSI/AAAAAAAA7BE/lnFhiIptd8E/s1600/Art-of-rhetoBric001_thumb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pvZTY7mKUAE/VZPFXPBlBSI/AAAAAAAA7BE/lnFhiIptd8E/s640/Art-of-rhetoBric001_thumb.jpg\" width=\"492\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the \u201cRhetoric\u201d,\nAristotle advises writers at length how to create anger toward some ideal\ncircumstance and how also to create a sense of calm in readers. &nbsp;He also explains principles of friendship and\nenmity as shared pleasure and pain. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0DyK7UVhSuo/VZPIHmu5gCI/AAAAAAAA7Bs/ZDSw6T51pZg/s1600/imawd7ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-0DyK7UVhSuo/VZPIHmu5gCI/AAAAAAAA7Bs/ZDSw6T51pZg/s400/imawd7ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\ndiscusses how to create in readers a sense of fear and shame and shamelessness\nand kindness and unkindness and pity and indignation and envy and indignation\nand emulation.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k8Z8wQB0DT4/VZPFgGuMT_I/AAAAAAAA7BM/1CDWL6M6r3Y/s1600/im432ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"192\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k8Z8wQB0DT4/VZPFgGuMT_I/AAAAAAAA7BM/1CDWL6M6r3Y/s640/im432ages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is very easy to create\na sense of indignation if you know the basics of human psychology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9_LPbPVktws/VZPHVVMs9wI/AAAAAAAA7Bc/vPF36y6_E1U/s1600/imag12es.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9_LPbPVktws/VZPHVVMs9wI/AAAAAAAA7Bc/vPF36y6_E1U/s400/imag12es.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 24px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">vara bandwagon -&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">unlike</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">the</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Bongs.</span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1CeIV5kMhDI/VZPGac8tzXI/AAAAAAAA7BU/S_oTqr0N9Vc/s1600/downloa49d%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b2iWuz1N_Zo/VZPIc8Qlg6I/AAAAAAAA7B0/RUcUJnyjnTY/s1600/ima29dges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b2iWuz1N_Zo/VZPIc8Qlg6I/AAAAAAAA7B0/RUcUJnyjnTY/s400/ima29dges.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">TEEEEEE &nbsp;HEEEEE !!!</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UePEr6NiJII/VZQYT380xnI/AAAAAAAA7CU/nVcK_uAHdMU/s1600/norFmal_idiots1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The persuasive appeal\nof pathos is an appeal to an audience's sense of identity, their self-interest,\ntheir emotions. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">When</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;a sp</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ak</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">r&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;wants a list</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">en</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">r to evaluate something negatively, he may try to arouse the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">listener's</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;s\nanger.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Rhetoric,\nAristotle advises writers at length how to create anger toward some ideal\ncircumstance and how also to create a sense of calm in readers. He also\nexplains principles of friendship and enmity as shared pleasure and pain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\ndiscusses how to create in readers a sense of fear and shame and shamelessness\nand kindness and unkindness and pity and indignation and envy and indignation\nand emulation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he starts all over and shows how to create such feelings\ntoward ideas in various types of human character' of \"people\" of\nvirtue and vice; those of youth, prime of life, and old age; and those of good\nfortune and those of bad fortune.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">Martin&nbsp;Luther&nbsp;King Jr mad</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">e</span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;a CHOOT out of his&nbsp;fellow&nbsp;blacks with PATHOS.</span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I am not\nunmindful that some of you have come here out of great trials and tribulations.\nSome of you have come fresh from narrow jail cells. And some of you have come\nfrom areas where your quest -- quest for freedom left you battered by the\nstorms of persecution and staggered by the winds of police brutality. You have\nbeen the veterans of creative suffering. Continue to work with the faith that\nunearned suffering is redemptive. Go back to Mississippi, go back to Alabama,\ngo back to South Carolina, go back to Georgia, go back to Louisiana, go back to\nthe slums and ghettos of our northern cities, knowing that somehow this\nsituation can and will be changed.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><br /></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>(I Have a Dream by\nMartin Luther King Jr. August 28th, 1963.)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3vDWWy4CMhE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3vDWWy4CMhE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is an appeal to\nPathos--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Better men than\nus have fought and died to preserve this great nation. &nbsp;Now is our turn to\nreturn the favor. &nbsp;&nbsp;For God and country,\ngentlemen!\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle says that if\nwe want to make an audience angry we need to know three things: 1) the state of\nmind of angry people, 2) who the people are that this audience usually gets\nangry at, and 3) on what grounds this audience gets angry at those people.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Uc4rxULeuxo/VZQc0xZOyDI/AAAAAAAA7Cg/MNfFosl53sU/s1600/sl9ide_9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The aim of pathos is to\nreduce the audience\u2019s ability to judge- and before this the speaker must arouse\nthe interest of the audience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on fear<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on\nworry<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on\nnostalgia<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on a\nsense of adventure<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on\ndesires<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on\nhorror<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on\ndisgust<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on\naffection<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Pathos can play on&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i>humor</i></span></span></div>\n<i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">e</i><b><i>tc</i></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pathos is a Greek word\nmeaning 'suffering' or 'experience,' s, utilizing story, sensory-based details\nand vivid language. Pathos appeals bring human experience into the argument. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , serif; line-height: 150%;\">While logos may touch\nthe mind, pathos touches the heart. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">E</span></b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">thos\ntouches the spirit.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
